00093 // TODO: should return whether there is valid context to continue
00094 void view3d_set_viewcontext(bContext *C, ViewContext *vc)
00095 {
00096     memset(vc, 0, sizeof(ViewContext));
00097     vc->ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
00098     vc->scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00099     vc->v3d = CTX_wm_view3d(C);
00100     vc->rv3d = CTX_wm_region_view3d(C);
00101     vc->obact = CTX_data_active_object(C);
00102     vc->obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
00103 }

00105 int view3d_get_view_aligned_coordinate(ViewContext *vc, float fp[3], const int mval[2], const short do_fallback)
00106 {
00107     float dvec[3];
00108     int mval_cpy[2];
00109 
00110     mval_cpy[0] = mval[0];
00111     mval_cpy[1] = mval[1];
00112 
00113     project_int_noclip(vc->ar, fp, mval_cpy);
00114 
00115     initgrabz(vc->rv3d, fp[0], fp[1], fp[2]);
00116 
00117     if (mval_cpy[0] != IS_CLIPPED) {
00118         float mval_f[2];
00119         VECSUB2D(mval_f, mval_cpy, mval);
00120         ED_view3d_win_to_delta(vc->ar, mval_f, dvec);
00121         sub_v3_v3(fp, dvec);
00122 
00123         return TRUE;
00124     }
00125     else {
00126         /* fallback to the view center */
00127         if (do_fallback) {
00128             negate_v3_v3(fp, vc->rv3d->ofs);
00129             return view3d_get_view_aligned_coordinate(vc, fp, mval, FALSE);
00130         }
00131         else {
00132             return FALSE;
00133         }
00134     }
00135 }

00137 /*
00138  * ob == NULL if you want global matrices
00139  * */
00140 void view3d_get_transformation(const ARegion *ar, RegionView3D *rv3d, Object *ob, bglMats *mats)
00141 {
00142     float cpy[4][4];
00143     int i, j;
00144 
00145     if (ob) {
00146         mult_m4_m4m4(cpy, rv3d->viewmat, ob->obmat);
00147     }
00148     else {
00149         copy_m4_m4(cpy, rv3d->viewmat);
00150     }
00151 
00152     for (i = 0; i < 4; ++i) {
00153         for (j = 0; j < 4; ++j) {
00154             mats->projection[i * 4 + j] = rv3d->winmat[i][j];
00155             mats->modelview[i * 4 + j] = cpy[i][j];
00156         }
00157     }
00158 
00159     mats->viewport[0] = ar->winrct.xmin;
00160     mats->viewport[1] = ar->winrct.ymin;
00161     mats->viewport[2] = ar->winx;
00162     mats->viewport[3] = ar->winy;   
00163 }

00169 static void edbm_backbuf_check_and_select_verts(BMEditMesh *em, int select)
00170 {
00171     BMVert *eve;
00172     BMIter iter;
00173     int index = bm_wireoffs;
00174 
00175     eve = BM_iter_new(&iter, em->bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH, NULL);
00176     for (; eve; eve = BM_iter_step(&iter), index++) {
00177         if (!BM_elem_flag_test(eve, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN)) {
00178             if (EDBM_backbuf_check(index)) {
00179                 BM_vert_select_set(em->bm, eve, select);
00180             }
00181         }
00182     }
00183 }
00184 
00185 static void edbm_backbuf_check_and_select_edges(BMEditMesh *em, int select)
00186 {
00187     BMEdge *eed;
00188     BMIter iter;
00189     int index = bm_solidoffs;
00190 
00191     eed = BM_iter_new(&iter, em->bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH, NULL);
00192     for (; eed; eed = BM_iter_step(&iter), index++) {
00193         if (!BM_elem_flag_test(eed, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN)) {
00194             if (EDBM_backbuf_check(index)) {
00195                 BM_edge_select_set(em->bm, eed, select);
00196             }
00197         }
00198     }
00199 }
00200 
00201 static void edbm_backbuf_check_and_select_faces(BMEditMesh *em, int select)
00202 {
00203     BMFace *efa;
00204     BMIter iter;
00205     int index = 1;
00206 
00207     efa = BM_iter_new(&iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH, NULL);
00208     for (; efa; efa = BM_iter_step(&iter), index++) {
00209         if (!BM_elem_flag_test(efa, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN)) {
00210             if (EDBM_backbuf_check(index)) {
00211                 BM_face_select_set(em->bm, efa, select);
00212             }
00213         }
00214     }
00215 }

00218 /* object mode, EM_ prefix is confusing here, rename? */
00219 static void edbm_backbuf_check_and_select_verts_obmode(Mesh *me, int select)
00220 {
00221     MVert *mv = me->mvert;
00222     int a;
00223 
00224     if (mv) {
00225         for (a = 1; a <= me->totvert; a++, mv++) {
00226             if (EDBM_backbuf_check(a)) {
00227                 if (!(mv->flag & ME_HIDE)) {
00228                     mv->flag = select ? (mv->flag | SELECT) : (mv->flag & ~SELECT);
00229                 }
00230             }
00231         }
00232     }
00233 }
00234 /* object mode, EM_ prefix is confusing here, rename? */

00236 static void edbm_backbuf_check_and_select_tfaces(Mesh *me, int select)
00237 {
00238     MPoly *mpoly = me->mpoly;
00239     int a;
00240 
00241     if (mpoly) {
00242         for (a = 1; a <= me->totpoly; a++, mpoly++) {
00243             if (EDBM_backbuf_check(a)) {
00244                 mpoly->flag = select ? (mpoly->flag | ME_FACE_SEL) : (mpoly->flag & ~ME_FACE_SEL);
00245             }
00246         }
00247     }
00248 }

00252 typedef struct LassoSelectUserData {
00253     ViewContext *vc;
00254     rcti *rect;
00255     int (*mcords)[2], moves, select, pass, done;

00257 
00258 static int view3d_selectable_data(bContext *C)
00259 {
00260     Object *ob = CTX_data_active_object(C);
00261 
00262     if (!ED_operator_region_view3d_active(C))
00263         return 0;
00264 
00265     if (ob) {
00266         if (ob->mode & OB_MODE_EDIT) {
00267             if (ob->type == OB_FONT) {
00268                 return 0;
00269             }
00270         }
00271         else {
00272             if (ob->mode & OB_MODE_SCULPT) {
00273                 return 0;
00274             }
00275             if ((ob->mode & (OB_MODE_VERTEX_PAINT | OB_MODE_WEIGHT_PAINT | OB_MODE_TEXTURE_PAINT)) &&
00276                 !paint_facesel_test(ob) && !paint_vertsel_test(ob))
00277             {
00278                 return 0;
00279             }
00280         }
00281     }
00282 
00283     return 1;
00284 }

00287 /* helper also for borderselect */
00288 static int edge_fully_inside_rect(rcti *rect, short x1, short y1, short x2, short y2)
00289 {
00290     return BLI_in_rcti(rect, x1, y1) && BLI_in_rcti(rect, x2, y2);
00291 }
00292 
00293 static int edge_inside_rect(rcti *rect, short x1, short y1, short x2, short y2)
00294 {
00295     int d1, d2, d3, d4;
00296     
00297     /* check points in rect */
00298     if (edge_fully_inside_rect(rect, x1, y1, x2, y2)) return 1;
00299     
00300     /* check points completely out rect */
00301     if (x1 < rect->xmin && x2 < rect->xmin) return 0;
00302     if (x1 > rect->xmax && x2 > rect->xmax) return 0;
00303     if (y1 < rect->ymin && y2 < rect->ymin) return 0;
00304     if (y1 > rect->ymax && y2 > rect->ymax) return 0;
00305     
00306     /* simple check lines intersecting. */
00307     d1 = (y1 - y2) * (x1 - rect->xmin) + (x2 - x1) * (y1 - rect->ymin);
00308     d2 = (y1 - y2) * (x1 - rect->xmin) + (x2 - x1) * (y1 - rect->ymax);
00309     d3 = (y1 - y2) * (x1 - rect->xmax) + (x2 - x1) * (y1 - rect->ymax);
00310     d4 = (y1 - y2) * (x1 - rect->xmax) + (x2 - x1) * (y1 - rect->ymin);
00311     
00312     if (d1 < 0 && d2 < 0 && d3 < 0 && d4 < 0) return 0;
00313     if (d1 > 0 && d2 > 0 && d3 > 0 && d4 > 0) return 0;
00314     
00315     return 1;
00316 }
00317 
00318 
00319 #define MOVES_GESTURE 50
00320 #define MOVES_LASSO 500
00321 
00322 int lasso_inside(int mcords[][2], short moves, int sx, int sy)
00323 {
00324     /* we do the angle rule, define that all added angles should be about zero or 2*PI */
00325     float angletot = 0.0, len, dot, ang, cross, fp1[2], fp2[2];
00326     int a;
00327     int *p1, *p2;
00328     
00329     if (sx == IS_CLIPPED)
00330         return 0;
00331     
00332     p1 = mcords[moves - 1];
00333     p2 = mcords[0];
00334     
00335     /* first vector */
00336     fp1[0] = (float)(p1[0] - sx);
00337     fp1[1] = (float)(p1[1] - sy);
00338     len = sqrt(fp1[0] * fp1[0] + fp1[1] * fp1[1]);
00339     fp1[0] /= len;
00340     fp1[1] /= len;
00341     
00342     for (a = 0; a < moves; a++) {
00343         /* second vector */
00344         fp2[0] = (float)(p2[0] - sx);
00345         fp2[1] = (float)(p2[1] - sy);
00346         len = sqrt(fp2[0] * fp2[0] + fp2[1] * fp2[1]);
00347         fp2[0] /= len;
00348         fp2[1] /= len;
00349         
00350         /* dot and angle and cross */
00351         dot = fp1[0] * fp2[0] + fp1[1] * fp2[1];
00352         ang = fabs(saacos(dot));
00353 
00354         cross = (float)((p1[1] - p2[1]) * (p1[0] - sx) + (p2[0] - p1[0]) * (p1[1] - sy));
00355         
00356         if (cross < 0.0f) angletot -= ang;
00357         else angletot += ang;
00358         
00359         /* circulate */
00360         fp1[0] = fp2[0]; fp1[1] = fp2[1];
00361         p1 = p2;
00362         p2 = mcords[a + 1];
00363     }
00364     
00365     if (fabs(angletot) > 4.0) return 1;
00366     return 0;
00367 }
00368 
00369 /* edge version for lasso select. we assume boundbox check was done */
00370 int lasso_inside_edge(int mcords[][2], short moves, int x0, int y0, int x1, int y1)
00371 {
00372     int v1[2], v2[2];
00373     int a;
00374 
00375     if (x0 == IS_CLIPPED || x1 == IS_CLIPPED)
00376         return 0;
00377     
00378     v1[0] = x0, v1[1] = y0;
00379     v2[0] = x1, v2[1] = y1;
00380 
00381     /* check points in lasso */
00382     if (lasso_inside(mcords, moves, v1[0], v1[1])) return 1;
00383     if (lasso_inside(mcords, moves, v2[0], v2[1])) return 1;
00384     
00385     /* no points in lasso, so we have to intersect with lasso edge */
00386     
00387     if (isect_line_line_v2_int(mcords[0], mcords[moves - 1], v1, v2) > 0) return 1;
00388     for (a = 0; a < moves - 1; a++) {
00389         if (isect_line_line_v2_int(mcords[a], mcords[a + 1], v1, v2) > 0) return 1;
00390     }
00391     
00392     return 0;
00393 }

00395 
00396 /* warning; lasso select with backbuffer-check draws in backbuf with persp(PERSP_WIN) 
00397  * and returns with persp(PERSP_VIEW). After lasso select backbuf is not OK
00398  */
00399 static void do_lasso_select_pose(ViewContext *vc, Object *ob, int mcords[][2], short moves, short select)
00400 {
00401     bPoseChannel *pchan;
00402     float vec[3];
00403     int sco1[2], sco2[2];
00404     bArmature *arm = ob->data;
00405     
00406     if (ob->type != OB_ARMATURE || ob->pose == NULL) return;
00407 
00408     for (pchan = ob->pose->chanbase.first; pchan; pchan = pchan->next) {
00409         if (PBONE_VISIBLE(arm, pchan->bone) && (pchan->bone->flag & BONE_UNSELECTABLE) == 0) {
00410             mul_v3_m4v3(vec, ob->obmat, pchan->pose_head);
00411             project_int(vc->ar, vec, sco1);
00412             mul_v3_m4v3(vec, ob->obmat, pchan->pose_tail);
00413             project_int(vc->ar, vec, sco2);
00414             
00415             if (lasso_inside_edge(mcords, moves, sco1[0], sco1[1], sco2[0], sco2[1])) {
00416                 if (select) pchan->bone->flag |= BONE_SELECTED;
00417                 else pchan->bone->flag &= ~BONE_SELECTED;
00418             }
00419         }
00420     }
00421 }
00422 
00423 static void object_deselect_all_visible(Scene *scene, View3D *v3d)
00424 {
00425     Base *base;
00426 
00427     for (base = scene->base.first; base; base = base->next) {
00428         if (BASE_SELECTABLE(v3d, base)) {
00429             ED_base_object_select(base, BA_DESELECT);
00430         }
00431     }
00432 }
00433 
00434 static void do_lasso_select_objects(ViewContext *vc, int mcords[][2], short moves, short extend, short select)
00435 {
00436     Base *base;
00437     
00438     if (extend == 0 && select)
00439         object_deselect_all_visible(vc->scene, vc->v3d);
00440 
00441     for (base = vc->scene->base.first; base; base = base->next) {
00442         if (BASE_SELECTABLE(vc->v3d, base)) { /* use this to avoid un-needed lasso lookups */
00443             project_short(vc->ar, base->object->obmat[3], &base->sx);
00444             if (lasso_inside(mcords, moves, base->sx, base->sy)) {
00445                 
00446                 if (select) ED_base_object_select(base, BA_SELECT);
00447                 else ED_base_object_select(base, BA_DESELECT);
00448                 base->object->flag = base->flag;
00449             }
00450             if (base->object->mode & OB_MODE_POSE) {
00451                 do_lasso_select_pose(vc, base->object, mcords, moves, select);
00452             }
00453         }
00454     }
00455 }
00456 
00457 static void lasso_select_boundbox(rcti *rect, int mcords[][2], short moves)
00458 {
00459     short a;
00460     
00461     rect->xmin = rect->xmax = mcords[0][0];
00462     rect->ymin = rect->ymax = mcords[0][1];
00463     
00464     for (a = 1; a < moves; a++) {
00465         if (mcords[a][0] < rect->xmin) rect->xmin = mcords[a][0];
00466         else if (mcords[a][0] > rect->xmax) rect->xmax = mcords[a][0];
00467         if (mcords[a][1] < rect->ymin) rect->ymin = mcords[a][1];
00468         else if (mcords[a][1] > rect->ymax) rect->ymax = mcords[a][1];
00469     }
00470 }
00471 
00472 static void do_lasso_select_mesh__doSelectVert(void *userData, BMVert *eve, int x, int y, int UNUSED(index))
00473 {
00474     LassoSelectUserData *data = userData;
00475 
00476     if (BLI_in_rcti(data->rect, x, y) && lasso_inside(data->mcords, data->moves, x, y)) {
00477         BM_vert_select_set(data->vc->em->bm, eve, data->select);
00478     }
00479 }
00480 static void do_lasso_select_mesh__doSelectEdge(void *userData, BMEdge *eed, int x0, int y0, int x1, int y1, int index)
00481 {
00482     LassoSelectUserData *data = userData;
00483 
00484     if (EDBM_backbuf_check(bm_solidoffs + index)) {
00485         if (data->pass == 0) {
00486             if (edge_fully_inside_rect(data->rect, x0, y0, x1, y1)  &&
00487                 lasso_inside(data->mcords, data->moves, x0, y0) &&
00488                 lasso_inside(data->mcords, data->moves, x1, y1)) {
00489                 BM_edge_select_set(data->vc->em->bm, eed, data->select);
00490                 data->done = 1;
00491             }
00492         }
00493         else {
00494             if (lasso_inside_edge(data->mcords, data->moves, x0, y0, x1, y1)) {
00495                 BM_edge_select_set(data->vc->em->bm, eed, data->select);
00496             }
00497         }
00498     }
00499 }
00500 static void do_lasso_select_mesh__doSelectFace(void *userData, BMFace *efa, int x, int y, int UNUSED(index))
00501 {
00502     LassoSelectUserData *data = userData;
00503 
00504     if (BLI_in_rcti(data->rect, x, y) && lasso_inside(data->mcords, data->moves, x, y)) {
00505         BM_face_select_set(data->vc->em->bm, efa, data->select);
00506     }
00507 }
00508 
00509 static void do_lasso_select_mesh(ViewContext *vc, int mcords[][2], short moves, short extend, short select)
00510 {
00511     LassoSelectUserData data;
00512     ToolSettings *ts = vc->scene->toolsettings;
00513     rcti rect;
00514     int bbsel;
00515     
00516     lasso_select_boundbox(&rect, mcords, moves);
00517     
00518     /* set editmesh */
00519     vc->em = BMEdit_FromObject(vc->obedit);
00520 
00521     data.vc = vc;
00522     data.rect = &rect;
00523     data.mcords = mcords;
00524     data.moves = moves;
00525     data.select = select;
00526     data.done = 0;
00527     data.pass = 0;
00528 
00529     if (extend == 0 && select)
00530         EDBM_flag_disable_all(vc->em, BM_ELEM_SELECT);
00531 
00532     /* for non zbuf projections, don't change the GL state */
00533     ED_view3d_init_mats_rv3d(vc->obedit, vc->rv3d);
00534 
00535     glLoadMatrixf(vc->rv3d->viewmat);
00536     bbsel = EDBM_backbuf_border_mask_init(vc, mcords, moves, rect.xmin, rect.ymin, rect.xmax, rect.ymax);
00537     
00538     if (ts->selectmode & SCE_SELECT_VERTEX) {
00539         if (bbsel) {
00540             edbm_backbuf_check_and_select_verts(vc->em, select);
00541         }
00542         else {
00543             mesh_foreachScreenVert(vc, do_lasso_select_mesh__doSelectVert, &data, V3D_CLIP_TEST_RV3D_CLIPPING);
00544         }
00545     }
00546     if (ts->selectmode & SCE_SELECT_EDGE) {
00547         /* Does both bbsel and non-bbsel versions (need screen cos for both) */
00548         data.pass = 0;
00549         mesh_foreachScreenEdge(vc, do_lasso_select_mesh__doSelectEdge, &data, V3D_CLIP_TEST_OFF);
00550 
00551         if (data.done == 0) {
00552             data.pass = 1;
00553             mesh_foreachScreenEdge(vc, do_lasso_select_mesh__doSelectEdge, &data, V3D_CLIP_TEST_OFF);
00554         }
00555     }
00556     
00557     if (ts->selectmode & SCE_SELECT_FACE) {
00558         if (bbsel) {
00559             edbm_backbuf_check_and_select_faces(vc->em, select);
00560         }
00561         else {
00562             mesh_foreachScreenFace(vc, do_lasso_select_mesh__doSelectFace, &data);
00563         }
00564     }
00565     
00566     EDBM_backbuf_free();
00567     EDBM_selectmode_flush(vc->em);
00568 }
00569

00571 #if 0
00572 /* this is an exception in that its the only lasso that dosnt use the 3d view (uses space image view) */
00573 static void do_lasso_select_mesh_uv(int mcords[][2], short moves, short select)
00574 {
00575     EditFace *efa;
00576     MTFace *tf;
00577     int screenUV[2], nverts, i, ok = 1;
00578     rcti rect;
00579     
00580     lasso_select_boundbox(&rect, mcords, moves);
00581     
00582     if (draw_uvs_face_check()) { /* Face Center Sel */
00583         float cent[2];
00584         ok = 0;
00585         for (efa = em->faces.first; efa; efa = efa->next) {
00586             /* assume not touched */
00587             efa->tmp.l = 0;
00588             tf = CustomData_em_get(&em->fdata, efa->data, CD_MTFACE);
00589             if ((select) != (simaFaceSel_Check(efa, tf))) {
00590                 uv_center(tf->uv, cent, (void *)efa->v4);
00591                 uvco_to_areaco_noclip(cent, screenUV);
00592                 if (BLI_in_rcti(&rect, screenUV[0], screenUV[1]) && lasso_inside(mcords, moves, screenUV[0], screenUV[1])) {
00593                     efa->tmp.l = ok = 1;
00594                 }
00595             }
00596         }
00597         /* (de)selects all tagged faces and deals with sticky modes */
00598         if (ok)
00599             uvface_setsel__internal(select);
00600         
00601     }
00602     else { /* Vert Sel*/
00603         for (efa = em->faces.first; efa; efa = efa->next) {
00604             tf = CustomData_em_get(&em->fdata, efa->data, CD_MTFACE);
00605             if (uvedit_face_visible_test(scene, ima, efa, tf)) {        
00606                 nverts = efa->v4 ? 4 : 3;
00607                 for (i = 0; i < nverts; i++) {
00608                     if ((select) != (simaUVSel_Check(efa, tf, i))) {
00609                         uvco_to_areaco_noclip(tf->uv[i], screenUV);
00610                         if (BLI_in_rcti(&rect, screenUV[0], screenUV[1]) && lasso_inside(mcords, moves, screenUV[0], screenUV[1])) {
00611                             if (select) {
00612                                 simaUVSel_Set(efa, tf, i);
00613                             }
00614                             else {
00615                                 simaUVSel_UnSet(efa, tf, i);
00616                             }
00617                         }
00618                     }
00619                 }
00620             }
00621         }
00622     }
00623     if (ok && G.sima->flag & SI_SYNC_UVSEL) {
00624         if (select) EM_select_flush(vc->em);
00625         else EM_deselect_flush(vc->em);
00626     }
00627 }
00628 #endif
00629 
00630 static void do_lasso_select_curve__doSelect(void *userData, Nurb *UNUSED(nu), BPoint *bp, BezTriple *bezt, int beztindex, int x, int y)
00631 {
00632     LassoSelectUserData *data = userData;
00633     Object *obedit = data->vc->obedit;
00634     Curve *cu = (Curve *)obedit->data;
00635 
00636     if (lasso_inside(data->mcords, data->moves, x, y)) {
00637         if (bp) {
00638             bp->f1 = data->select ? (bp->f1 | SELECT) : (bp->f1 & ~SELECT);
00639             if (bp == cu->lastsel && !(bp->f1 & 1)) cu->lastsel = NULL;
00640         }
00641         else {
00642             if (cu->drawflag & CU_HIDE_HANDLES) {
00643                 /* can only be beztindex==0 here since handles are hidden */
00644                 bezt->f1 = bezt->f2 = bezt->f3 = data->select ? (bezt->f2 | SELECT) : (bezt->f2 & ~SELECT);
00645             }
00646             else {
00647                 if (beztindex == 0) {
00648                     bezt->f1 = data->select ? (bezt->f1 | SELECT) : (bezt->f1 & ~SELECT);
00649                 }
00650                 else if (beztindex == 1) {
00651                     bezt->f2 = data->select ? (bezt->f2 | SELECT) : (bezt->f2 & ~SELECT);
00652                 }
00653                 else {
00654                     bezt->f3 = data->select ? (bezt->f3 | SELECT) : (bezt->f3 & ~SELECT);
00655                 }
00656             }
00657 
00658             if (bezt == cu->lastsel && !(bezt->f2 & 1)) cu->lastsel = NULL;
00659         }
00660     }
00661 }
00662 
00663 static void do_lasso_select_curve(ViewContext *vc, int mcords[][2], short moves, short extend, short select)
00664 {
00665     LassoSelectUserData data;
00666 
00667     /* set vc->editnurb */
00668     data.vc = vc;
00669     data.mcords = mcords;
00670     data.moves = moves;
00671     data.select = select;
00672 
00673     if (extend == 0 && select)
00674         CU_deselect_all(vc->obedit);
00675 
00676     ED_view3d_init_mats_rv3d(vc->obedit, vc->rv3d); /* for foreach's screen/vert projection */
00677     nurbs_foreachScreenVert(vc, do_lasso_select_curve__doSelect, &data);
00678 }
00679 
00680 static void do_lasso_select_lattice__doSelect(void *userData, BPoint *bp, int x, int y)
00681 {
00682     LassoSelectUserData *data = userData;
00683 
00684     if (lasso_inside(data->mcords, data->moves, x, y)) {
00685         bp->f1 = data->select ? (bp->f1 | SELECT) : (bp->f1 & ~SELECT);
00686     }
00687 }
00688 static void do_lasso_select_lattice(ViewContext *vc, int mcords[][2], short moves, short extend, short select)
00689 {
00690     LassoSelectUserData data;
00691 
00692     /* set editdata in vc */
00693     data.mcords = mcords;
00694     data.moves = moves;
00695     data.select = select;
00696 
00697     if (extend == 0 && select)
00698         ED_setflagsLatt(vc->obedit, 0);
00699 
00700     ED_view3d_init_mats_rv3d(vc->obedit, vc->rv3d); /* for foreach's screen/vert projection */
00701     lattice_foreachScreenVert(vc, do_lasso_select_lattice__doSelect, &data);
00702 }
00703 
00704 static void do_lasso_select_armature(ViewContext *vc, int mcords[][2], short moves, short extend, short select)
00705 {
00706     bArmature *arm = vc->obedit->data;
00707     EditBone *ebone;
00708     float vec[3];
00709     short sco1[2], sco2[2], didpoint;
00710     int change = FALSE;
00711 
00712     if (extend == 0 && select)
00713         ED_armature_deselect_all_visible(vc->obedit);
00714 
00715     /* set editdata in vc */
00716     
00717     for (ebone = arm->edbo->first; ebone; ebone = ebone->next) {
00718         if (EBONE_VISIBLE(arm, ebone) && (ebone->flag & BONE_UNSELECTABLE) == 0) {
00719             mul_v3_m4v3(vec, vc->obedit->obmat, ebone->head);
00720             project_short(vc->ar, vec, sco1);
00721             mul_v3_m4v3(vec, vc->obedit->obmat, ebone->tail);
00722             project_short(vc->ar, vec, sco2);
00723             
00724             didpoint = 0;
00725             if (lasso_inside(mcords, moves, sco1[0], sco1[1])) {
00726                 if (select) ebone->flag |= BONE_ROOTSEL;
00727                 else ebone->flag &= ~BONE_ROOTSEL;
00728                 didpoint = 1;
00729                 change = TRUE;
00730             }
00731             if (lasso_inside(mcords, moves, sco2[0], sco2[1])) {
00732                 if (select) ebone->flag |= BONE_TIPSEL;
00733                 else ebone->flag &= ~BONE_TIPSEL;
00734                 didpoint = 1;
00735                 change = TRUE;
00736             }
00737             /* if one of points selected, we skip the bone itself */
00738             if (didpoint == 0 && lasso_inside_edge(mcords, moves, sco1[0], sco1[1], sco2[0], sco2[1])) {
00739                 if (select) ebone->flag |= BONE_TIPSEL | BONE_ROOTSEL | BONE_SELECTED;
00740                 else ebone->flag &= ~(BONE_SELECTED | BONE_TIPSEL | BONE_ROOTSEL);
00741                 change = TRUE;
00742             }
00743         }
00744     }
00745     
00746     if (change) {
00747         ED_armature_sync_selection(arm->edbo);
00748         ED_armature_validate_active(arm);
00749         WM_main_add_notifier(NC_OBJECT | ND_BONE_SELECT, vc->obedit);
00750     }
00751 }
00752 
00753 
00754 
00755 
00756 static void do_lasso_select_meta(ViewContext *vc, int mcords[][2], short moves, short extend, short select)
00757 {
00758     MetaBall *mb = (MetaBall *)vc->obedit->data;
00759     MetaElem *ml;
00760     float vec[3];
00761     short sco[2];
00762 
00763     if (extend == 0 && select) {
00764         for (ml = mb->editelems->first; ml; ml = ml->next) {
00765             ml->flag &= ~SELECT;
00766         }
00767     }
00768 
00769     for (ml = mb->editelems->first; ml; ml = ml->next) {
00770         
00771         mul_v3_m4v3(vec, vc->obedit->obmat, &ml->x);
00772         project_short(vc->ar, vec, sco);
00773 
00774         if (lasso_inside(mcords, moves, sco[0], sco[1])) {
00775             if (select) ml->flag |= SELECT;
00776             else ml->flag &= ~SELECT;
00777         }
00778     }
00779 }
00780 
00781 int do_paintvert_box_select(ViewContext *vc, rcti *rect, int select, int extend)
00782 {
00783     Mesh *me;
00784     MVert *mvert;
00785     struct ImBuf *ibuf;
00786     unsigned int *rt;
00787     int a, index;
00788     char *selar;
00789     int sx = rect->xmax - rect->xmin + 1;
00790     int sy = rect->ymax - rect->ymin + 1;
00791 
00792     me = vc->obact->data;
00793 
00794     if (me == NULL || me->totvert == 0 || sx * sy <= 0)
00795         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00796 
00797     selar = MEM_callocN(me->totvert + 1, "selar");
00798 
00799     if (extend == 0 && select)
00800         paintvert_deselect_all_visible(vc->obact, SEL_DESELECT, FALSE);
00801 
00802     view3d_validate_backbuf(vc);
00803 
00804     ibuf = IMB_allocImBuf(sx, sy, 32, IB_rect);
00805     rt = ibuf->rect;
00806     glReadPixels(rect->xmin + vc->ar->winrct.xmin,  rect->ymin + vc->ar->winrct.ymin, sx, sy, GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE,  ibuf->rect);
00807     if (ENDIAN_ORDER == B_ENDIAN) IMB_convert_rgba_to_abgr(ibuf);
00808 
00809     a = sx * sy;
00810     while (a--) {
00811         if (*rt) {
00812             index = WM_framebuffer_to_index(*rt);
00813             if (index <= me->totvert) selar[index] = 1;
00814         }
00815         rt++;
00816     }
00817 
00818     mvert = me->mvert;
00819     for (a = 1; a <= me->totvert; a++, mvert++) {
00820         if (selar[a]) {
00821             if ((mvert->flag & ME_HIDE) == 0) {
00822                 if (select) mvert->flag |=  SELECT;
00823                 else        mvert->flag &= ~SELECT;
00824             }
00825         }
00826     }
00827 
00828     IMB_freeImBuf(ibuf);
00829     MEM_freeN(selar);
00830 
00831 #ifdef __APPLE__    
00832     glReadBuffer(GL_BACK);
00833 #endif
00834 
00835     paintvert_flush_flags(vc->obact);
00836 
00837     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00838 }
00839 
00840 static void do_lasso_select_paintvert(ViewContext *vc, int mcords[][2], short moves, short extend, short select)
00841 {
00842     Object *ob = vc->obact;
00843     Mesh *me = ob ? ob->data : NULL;
00844     rcti rect;
00845 
00846     if (me == NULL || me->totvert == 0)
00847         return;
00848 
00849     if (extend == 0 && select)
00850         paintvert_deselect_all_visible(ob, SEL_DESELECT, FALSE);  /* flush selection at the end */
00851     bm_vertoffs = me->totvert + 1; /* max index array */
00852 
00853     lasso_select_boundbox(&rect, mcords, moves);
00854     EDBM_backbuf_border_mask_init(vc, mcords, moves, rect.xmin, rect.ymin, rect.xmax, rect.ymax);
00855 
00856     edbm_backbuf_check_and_select_verts_obmode(me, select);
00857 
00858     EDBM_backbuf_free();
00859 
00860     paintvert_flush_flags(ob);
00861 }
00862 static void do_lasso_select_paintface(ViewContext *vc, int mcords[][2], short moves, short extend, short select)
00863 {
00864     Object *ob = vc->obact;
00865     Mesh *me = ob ? ob->data : NULL;
00866     rcti rect;
00867 
00868     if (me == NULL || me->totpoly == 0)
00869         return;
00870 
00871     if (extend == 0 && select)
00872         paintface_deselect_all_visible(ob, SEL_DESELECT, FALSE);  /* flush selection at the end */
00873 
00874     bm_vertoffs = me->totpoly + 1; /* max index array */
00875 
00876     lasso_select_boundbox(&rect, mcords, moves);
00877     EDBM_backbuf_border_mask_init(vc, mcords, moves, rect.xmin, rect.ymin, rect.xmax, rect.ymax);
00878     
00879     edbm_backbuf_check_and_select_tfaces(me, select);
00880 
00881     EDBM_backbuf_free();
00882 
00883     paintface_flush_flags(ob);
00884 }

00886 #if 0
00887 static void do_lasso_select_node(int mcords[][2], short moves, short select)
00888 {
00889     SpaceNode *snode = sa->spacedata.first;
00890     
00891     bNode *node;
00892     rcti rect;
00893     short node_cent[2];
00894     float node_centf[2];

00896     lasso_select_boundbox(&rect, mcords, moves);
00897

00899     for (node = snode->edittree->nodes.first; node; node = node->next) {
00900

00917 
00918 static void view3d_lasso_select(bContext *C, ViewContext *vc, int mcords[][2], short moves, short extend, short select)
00919 {
00920     Object *ob = CTX_data_active_object(C);
00921 
00922     if (vc->obedit == NULL) { /* Object Mode */
00923         if (paint_facesel_test(ob))
00924             do_lasso_select_paintface(vc, mcords, moves, extend, select);
00925         else if (paint_vertsel_test(ob))
00926             do_lasso_select_paintvert(vc, mcords, moves, extend, select);
00927         else if (ob && ob->mode & (OB_MODE_VERTEX_PAINT | OB_MODE_WEIGHT_PAINT | OB_MODE_TEXTURE_PAINT))
00928             ;
00929         else if (ob && ob->mode & OB_MODE_PARTICLE_EDIT)
00930             PE_lasso_select(C, mcords, moves, extend, select);
00931         else {
00932             do_lasso_select_objects(vc, mcords, moves, extend, select);
00933             WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE | ND_OB_SELECT, vc->scene);
00934         }
00935     }
00936     else { /* Edit Mode */
00937         switch (vc->obedit->type) {
00938             case OB_MESH:
00939                 do_lasso_select_mesh(vc, mcords, moves, extend, select);
00940                 break;
00941             case OB_CURVE:
00942             case OB_SURF:
00943                 do_lasso_select_curve(vc, mcords, moves, extend, select);
00944                 break;
00945             case OB_LATTICE:
00946                 do_lasso_select_lattice(vc, mcords, moves, extend, select);
00947                 break;
00948             case OB_ARMATURE:
00949                 do_lasso_select_armature(vc, mcords, moves, extend, select);
00950                 break;
00951             case OB_MBALL:
00952                 do_lasso_select_meta(vc, mcords, moves, extend, select);
00953                 break;
00954             default:
00955                 assert(!"lasso select on incorrect object type");
00956         }
00957 
00958         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM | ND_SELECT, vc->obedit->data);
00959     }
00960 }
00961 
00962 
00963 /* lasso operator gives properties, but since old code works
00964  * with short array we convert */
00965 static int view3d_lasso_select_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00966 {
00967     ViewContext vc;
00968     int i = 0;
00969     int mcords[1024][2];
00970 
00971     RNA_BEGIN(op->ptr, itemptr, "path") {
00972         float loc[2];
00973         
00974         RNA_float_get_array(&itemptr, "loc", loc);
00975         mcords[i][0] = (int)loc[0];
00976         mcords[i][1] = (int)loc[1];
00977         i++;
00978         if (i >= 1024) break;
00979     }
00980     RNA_END;
00981     
00982     if (i > 1) {
00983         short extend, select;
00984         view3d_operator_needs_opengl(C);
00985         
00986         /* setup view context for argument to callbacks */
00987         view3d_set_viewcontext(C, &vc);
00988         
00989         extend = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "extend");
00990         select = !RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "deselect");
00991         view3d_lasso_select(C, &vc, mcords, i, extend, select);
00992         
00993         return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00994     }
00995     return OPERATOR_PASS_THROUGH;
00996 }
00997 
00998 void VIEW3D_OT_select_lasso(wmOperatorType *ot)
00999 {
01000     ot->name = "Lasso Select";
01001     ot->description = "Select items using lasso selection";
01002     ot->idname = "VIEW3D_OT_select_lasso";
01003     
01004     ot->invoke = WM_gesture_lasso_invoke;
01005     ot->modal = WM_gesture_lasso_modal;
01006     ot->exec = view3d_lasso_select_exec;
01007     ot->poll = view3d_selectable_data;
01008     ot->cancel = WM_gesture_lasso_cancel;
01009     
01010     /* flags */
01011     ot->flag = OPTYPE_UNDO;
01012     
01013     RNA_def_collection_runtime(ot->srna, "path", &RNA_OperatorMousePath, "Path", "");
01014     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "deselect", 0, "Deselect", "Deselect rather than select items");
01015     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "extend", 1, "Extend", "Extend selection instead of deselecting everything first");
01016 }

01021 #if 0
01022 /* smart function to sample a rect spiralling outside, nice for backbuf selection */
01023 static unsigned int samplerect(unsigned int *buf, int size, unsigned int dontdo)
01024 {
01025     Base *base;
01026     unsigned int *bufmin, *bufmax;
01027     int a, b, rc, tel, len, dirvec[4][2], maxob;
01028     unsigned int retval = 0;
01029     
01030     base = LASTBASE;
01031     if (base == 0) return 0;
01032     maxob = base->selcol;
01033 
01034     len = (size - 1) / 2;
01035     rc = 0;
01036 
01037     dirvec[0][0] = 1;
01038     dirvec[0][1] = 0;
01039     dirvec[1][0] = 0;
01040     dirvec[1][1] = -size;
01041     dirvec[2][0] = -1;
01042     dirvec[2][1] = 0;
01043     dirvec[3][0] = 0;
01044     dirvec[3][1] = size;
01045 
01046     bufmin = buf;
01047     bufmax = buf + size * size;
01048     buf += len * size + len;
01049 
01050     for (tel = 1; tel <= size; tel++) {
01051 
01052         for (a = 0; a < 2; a++) {
01053             for (b = 0; b < tel; b++) {
01054 
01055                 if (*buf && *buf <= maxob && *buf != dontdo) return *buf;
01056                 if (*buf == dontdo) retval = dontdo;  /* if only color dontdo is available, still return dontdo */
01057                 
01058                 buf += (dirvec[rc][0] + dirvec[rc][1]);
01059 
01060                 if (buf < bufmin || buf >= bufmax) return retval;
01061             }
01062             rc++;
01063             rc &= 3;
01064         }
01065     }
01066     return retval;
01067 }
01068 #endif
