01072 
01073 /* The max number of menu items in an object select menu */
01074 typedef struct SelMenuItemF {
01075     char idname[MAX_ID_NAME - 2];
01076     int icon;
01077 } SelMenuItemF;
01078 
01079 #define SEL_MENU_SIZE   22
01080 static SelMenuItemF object_mouse_select_menu_data[SEL_MENU_SIZE];
01081 
01082 /* special (crappy) operator only for menu select */
01083 static EnumPropertyItem *object_select_menu_enum_itemf(bContext *C, PointerRNA *UNUSED(ptr), PropertyRNA *UNUSED(prop), int *free)
01084 {
01085     EnumPropertyItem *item = NULL, item_tmp = {0};
01086     int totitem = 0;
01087     int i = 0;
01088 
01089     /* don't need context but avoid docgen using this */
01090     if (C == NULL || object_mouse_select_menu_data[i].idname[0] == '\0') {
01091         return DummyRNA_NULL_items;
01092     }
01093 
01094     for (; i < SEL_MENU_SIZE && object_mouse_select_menu_data[i].idname[0] != '\0'; i++) {
01095         item_tmp.name = object_mouse_select_menu_data[i].idname;
01096         item_tmp.identifier = object_mouse_select_menu_data[i].idname;
01097         item_tmp.value = i;
01098         item_tmp.icon = object_mouse_select_menu_data[i].icon;
01099         RNA_enum_item_add(&item, &totitem, &item_tmp);
01100     }
01101 
01102     RNA_enum_item_end(&item, &totitem);
01103     *free = 1;
01104 
01105     return item;
01106 }
01107 
01108 static int object_select_menu_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01109 {
01110     int name_index = RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "name");
01111     short extend = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "extend");
01112     short changed = 0;
01113     const char *name = object_mouse_select_menu_data[name_index].idname;
01114 
01115     if (!extend) {
01116         CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, Base *, base, selectable_bases) {
01117             if (base->flag & SELECT) {
01118                 ED_base_object_select(base, BA_DESELECT);
01119                 changed = 1;
01120             }
01121         }
01122         CTX_DATA_END;
01123     }
01124 
01125     CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, Base *, base, selectable_bases) {
01126         /* this is a bit dodjy, there should only be ONE object with this name, but library objects can mess this up */
01127         if (strcmp(name, base->object->id.name + 2) == 0) {
01128             ED_base_object_activate(C, base);
01129             ED_base_object_select(base, BA_SELECT);
01130             changed = 1;
01131         }
01132     }
01133     CTX_DATA_END;
01134 
01135     /* weak but ensures we activate menu again before using the enum */
01136     memset(object_mouse_select_menu_data, 0, sizeof(object_mouse_select_menu_data));
01137 
01138     /* undo? */
01139     if (changed) {
01140         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE | ND_OB_SELECT, CTX_data_scene(C));
01141         return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01142     }
01143     else {
01144         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01145     }
01146 }
01147 
01148 void VIEW3D_OT_select_menu(wmOperatorType *ot)
01149 {
01150     PropertyRNA *prop;
01151 
01152     /* identifiers */
01153     ot->name = "Select Menu";
01154     ot->description = "Menu object selection";
01155     ot->idname = "VIEW3D_OT_select_menu";
01156 
01157     /* api callbacks */
01158     ot->invoke = WM_menu_invoke;
01159     ot->exec = object_select_menu_exec;
01160 
01161     /* flags */
01162     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER | OPTYPE_UNDO;
01163 
01164     /* keyingset to use (dynamic enum) */
01165     prop = RNA_def_enum(ot->srna, "name", DummyRNA_NULL_items, 0, "Object Name", "");
01166     RNA_def_enum_funcs(prop, object_select_menu_enum_itemf);
01167     RNA_def_property_flag(prop, PROP_HIDDEN);
01168     ot->prop = prop;
01169 
01170     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "extend", 0, "Extend", "Extend selection instead of deselecting everything first");
01171 }
01172 
01173 static void deselectall_except(Scene *scene, Base *b)   /* deselect all except b */
01174 {
01175     Base *base;
01176     
01177     for (base = FIRSTBASE; base; base = base->next) {
01178         if (base->flag & SELECT) {
01179             if (b != base) {
01180                 ED_base_object_select(base, BA_DESELECT);
01181             }
01182         }
01183     }
01184 }
01185 
01186 static Base *object_mouse_select_menu(bContext *C, ViewContext *vc, unsigned int *buffer, int hits, const int mval[2], short extend)
01187 {
01188     short baseCount = 0;
01189     short ok;
01190     LinkNode *linklist = NULL;
01191     
01192     CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, Base *, base, selectable_bases) {
01193         ok = FALSE;
01194 
01195         /* two selection methods, the CTRL select uses max dist of 15 */
01196         if (buffer) {
01197             int a;
01198             for (a = 0; a < hits; a++) {
01199                 /* index was converted */
01200                 if (base->selcol == buffer[(4 * a) + 3])
01201                     ok = TRUE;
01202             }
01203         }
01204         else {
01205             int temp, dist = 15;
01206 
01207             project_short(vc->ar, base->object->obmat[3], &base->sx);
01208             
01209             temp = abs(base->sx - mval[0]) + abs(base->sy - mval[1]);
01210             if (temp < dist)
01211                 ok = TRUE;
01212         }
01213 
01214         if (ok) {
01215             baseCount++;
01216             BLI_linklist_prepend(&linklist, base);
01217 
01218             if (baseCount == SEL_MENU_SIZE)
01219                 break;
01220         }
01221     }
01222     CTX_DATA_END;
01223 
01224     if (baseCount == 0) {
01225         return NULL;
01226     }
01227     if (baseCount == 1) {
01228         Base *base = (Base *)linklist->link;
01229         BLI_linklist_free(linklist, NULL);
01230         return base;
01231     }
01232     else {
01233         /* UI, full in static array values that we later use in an enum function */
01234         LinkNode *node;
01235         int i;
01236 
01237         memset(object_mouse_select_menu_data, 0, sizeof(object_mouse_select_menu_data));
01238 
01239         for (node = linklist, i = 0; node; node = node->next, i++) {
01240             Base *base = node->link;
01241             Object *ob = base->object;
01242             char *name = ob->id.name + 2;
01243 
01244             BLI_strncpy(object_mouse_select_menu_data[i].idname, name, MAX_ID_NAME - 2);
01245             object_mouse_select_menu_data[i].icon = uiIconFromID(&ob->id);
01246         }
01247 
01248         {
01249             PointerRNA ptr;
01250 
01251             WM_operator_properties_create(&ptr, "VIEW3D_OT_select_menu");
01252             RNA_boolean_set(&ptr, "extend", extend);
01253             WM_operator_name_call(C, "VIEW3D_OT_select_menu", WM_OP_INVOKE_DEFAULT, &ptr);
01254             WM_operator_properties_free(&ptr);
01255         }
01256 
01257         BLI_linklist_free(linklist, NULL);
01258         return NULL;
01259     }
01260 }
01261 
01262 /* we want a select buffer with bones, if there are... */
01263 /* so check three selection levels and compare */
01264 static short mixed_bones_object_selectbuffer(ViewContext *vc, unsigned int *buffer, const int mval[2])
01265 {
01266     rcti rect;
01267     int offs;
01268     short a, hits15, hits9 = 0, hits5 = 0;
01269     short has_bones15 = 0, has_bones9 = 0, has_bones5 = 0;
01270     
01271     BLI_init_rcti(&rect, mval[0] - 14, mval[0] + 14, mval[1] - 14, mval[1] + 14);
01272     hits15 = view3d_opengl_select(vc, buffer, MAXPICKBUF, &rect);
01273     if (hits15 > 0) {
01274         for (a = 0; a < hits15; a++) if (buffer[4 * a + 3] & 0xFFFF0000) has_bones15 = 1;
01275 
01276         offs = 4 * hits15;
01277         BLI_init_rcti(&rect, mval[0] - 9, mval[0] + 9, mval[1] - 9, mval[1] + 9);
01278         hits9 = view3d_opengl_select(vc, buffer + offs, MAXPICKBUF - offs, &rect);
01279         if (hits9 > 0) {
01280             for (a = 0; a < hits9; a++) if (buffer[offs + 4 * a + 3] & 0xFFFF0000) has_bones9 = 1;
01281 
01282             offs += 4 * hits9;
01283             BLI_init_rcti(&rect, mval[0] - 5, mval[0] + 5, mval[1] - 5, mval[1] + 5);
01284             hits5 = view3d_opengl_select(vc, buffer + offs, MAXPICKBUF - offs, &rect);
01285             if (hits5 > 0) {
01286                 for (a = 0; a < hits5; a++) if (buffer[offs + 4 * a + 3] & 0xFFFF0000) has_bones5 = 1;
01287             }
01288         }
01289         
01290         if (has_bones5) {
01291             offs = 4 * hits15 + 4 * hits9;
01292             memcpy(buffer, buffer + offs, 4 * offs);
01293             return hits5;
01294         }
01295         if (has_bones9) {
01296             offs = 4 * hits15;
01297             memcpy(buffer, buffer + offs, 4 * offs);
01298             return hits9;
01299         }
01300         if (has_bones15) {
01301             return hits15;
01302         }
01303         
01304         if (hits5 > 0) {
01305             offs = 4 * hits15 + 4 * hits9;
01306             memcpy(buffer, buffer + offs, 4 * offs);
01307             return hits5;
01308         }
01309         if (hits9 > 0) {
01310             offs = 4 * hits15;
01311             memcpy(buffer, buffer + offs, 4 * offs);
01312             return hits9;
01313         }
01314         return hits15;
01315     }
01316     
01317     return 0;
01318 }
01319 
01320 /* returns basact */
01321 static Base *mouse_select_eval_buffer(ViewContext *vc, unsigned int *buffer, int hits, const int mval[2], Base *startbase, int has_bones)
01322 {
01323     Scene *scene = vc->scene;
01324     View3D *v3d = vc->v3d;
01325     Base *base, *basact = NULL;
01326     static int lastmval[2] = {-100, -100};
01327     int a, donearest = 0;
01328     
01329     /* define if we use solid nearest select or not */
01330     if (v3d->drawtype > OB_WIRE) {
01331         donearest = 1;
01332         if (ABS(mval[0] - lastmval[0]) < 3 && ABS(mval[1] - lastmval[1]) < 3) {
01333             if (!has_bones) /* hrms, if theres bones we always do nearest */
01334                 donearest = 0;
01335         }
01336     }
01337     lastmval[0] = mval[0]; lastmval[1] = mval[1];
01338     
01339     if (donearest) {
01340         unsigned int min = 0xFFFFFFFF;
01341         int selcol = 0, notcol = 0;
01342         
01343         
01344         if (has_bones) {
01345             /* we skip non-bone hits */
01346             for (a = 0; a < hits; a++) {
01347                 if (min > buffer[4 * a + 1] && (buffer[4 * a + 3] & 0xFFFF0000) ) {
01348                     min = buffer[4 * a + 1];
01349                     selcol = buffer[4 * a + 3] & 0xFFFF;
01350                 }
01351             }
01352         }
01353         else {
01354             /* only exclude active object when it is selected... */
01355             if (BASACT && (BASACT->flag & SELECT) && hits > 1) notcol = BASACT->selcol;
01356             
01357             for (a = 0; a < hits; a++) {
01358                 if (min > buffer[4 * a + 1] && notcol != (buffer[4 * a + 3] & 0xFFFF)) {
01359                     min = buffer[4 * a + 1];
01360                     selcol = buffer[4 * a + 3] & 0xFFFF;
01361                 }
01362             }
01363         }
01364         
01365         base = FIRSTBASE;
01366         while (base) {
01367             if (BASE_SELECTABLE(v3d, base)) {
01368                 if (base->selcol == selcol) break;
01369             }
01370             base = base->next;
01371         }
01372         if (base) basact = base;
01373     }
01374     else {
01375         
01376         base = startbase;
01377         while (base) {
01378             /* skip objects with select restriction, to prevent prematurely ending this loop
01379              * with an un-selectable choice */
01380             if (base->object->restrictflag & OB_RESTRICT_SELECT) {
01381                 base = base->next;
01382                 if (base == NULL) base = FIRSTBASE;
01383                 if (base == startbase) break;
01384             }
01385             
01386             if (BASE_SELECTABLE(v3d, base)) {
01387                 for (a = 0; a < hits; a++) {
01388                     if (has_bones) {
01389                         /* skip non-bone objects */
01390                         if ((buffer[4 * a + 3] & 0xFFFF0000)) {
01391                             if (base->selcol == (buffer[(4 * a) + 3] & 0xFFFF))
01392                                 basact = base;
01393                         }
01394                     }
01395                     else {
01396                         if (base->selcol == (buffer[(4 * a) + 3] & 0xFFFF))
01397                             basact = base;
01398                     }
01399                 }
01400             }
01401             
01402             if (basact) break;
01403             
01404             base = base->next;
01405             if (base == NULL) base = FIRSTBASE;
01406             if (base == startbase) break;
01407         }
01408     }
01409     
01410     return basact;
01411 }
01412 
01413 /* mval comes from event->mval, only use within region handlers */
01414 Base *ED_view3d_give_base_under_cursor(bContext *C, const int mval[2])
01415 {
01416     ViewContext vc;
01417     Base *basact = NULL;
01418     unsigned int buffer[4 * MAXPICKBUF];
01419     int hits;
01420     
01421     /* setup view context for argument to callbacks */
01422     view3d_operator_needs_opengl(C);
01423     view3d_set_viewcontext(C, &vc);
01424     
01425     hits = mixed_bones_object_selectbuffer(&vc, buffer, mval);
01426     
01427     if (hits > 0) {
01428         int a, has_bones = 0;
01429         
01430         for (a = 0; a < hits; a++) if (buffer[4 * a + 3] & 0xFFFF0000) has_bones = 1;
01431         
01432         basact = mouse_select_eval_buffer(&vc, buffer, hits, mval, vc.scene->base.first, has_bones);
01433     }
01434     
01435     return basact;
01436 }
01437 
01438 static void deselect_all_tracks(MovieTracking *tracking)
01439 {
01440     MovieTrackingObject *object;
01441 
01442     object = tracking->objects.first;
01443     while (object) {
01444         ListBase *tracksbase = BKE_tracking_object_tracks(tracking, object);
01445         MovieTrackingTrack *track = tracksbase->first;
01446 
01447         while (track) {
01448             BKE_tracking_deselect_track(track, TRACK_AREA_ALL);
01449 
01450             track = track->next;
01451         }
01452 
01453         object = object->next;
01454     }
01455 }
01456 
01457 /* mval is region coords */
01458 static int mouse_select(bContext *C, const int mval[2], short extend, short obcenter, short enumerate)
01459 {
01460     ViewContext vc;
01461     ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
01462     View3D *v3d = CTX_wm_view3d(C);
01463     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
01464     Base *base, *startbase = NULL, *basact = NULL, *oldbasact = NULL;
01465     int temp, a, dist = 100;
01466     int retval = 0;
01467     short hits;
01468     
01469     /* setup view context for argument to callbacks */
01470     view3d_set_viewcontext(C, &vc);
01471     
01472     /* always start list from basact in wire mode */
01473     startbase =  FIRSTBASE;
01474     if (BASACT && BASACT->next) startbase = BASACT->next;
01475     
01476     /* This block uses the control key to make the object selected by its center point rather than its contents */
01477     /* in editmode do not activate */
01478     if (obcenter) {
01479         
01480         /* note; shift+alt goes to group-flush-selecting */
01481         if (enumerate) {
01482             basact = object_mouse_select_menu(C, &vc, NULL, 0, mval, extend);
01483         }
01484         else {
01485             base = startbase;
01486             while (base) {
01487                 if (BASE_SELECTABLE(v3d, base)) {
01488                     project_short(ar, base->object->obmat[3], &base->sx);
01489                     
01490                     temp = abs(base->sx - mval[0]) + abs(base->sy - mval[1]);
01491                     if (base == BASACT) temp += 10;
01492                     if (temp < dist) {
01493                         
01494                         dist = temp;
01495                         basact = base;
01496                     }
01497                 }
01498                 base = base->next;
01499                 
01500                 if (base == NULL) base = FIRSTBASE;
01501                 if (base == startbase) break;
01502             }
01503         }
01504     }
01505     else {
01506         unsigned int buffer[4 * MAXPICKBUF];
01507 
01508         /* if objects have posemode set, the bones are in the same selection buffer */
01509         
01510         hits = mixed_bones_object_selectbuffer(&vc, buffer, mval);
01511         
01512         if (hits > 0) {
01513             int has_bones = 0;
01514             
01515             /* note: bundles are handling in the same way as bones */
01516             for (a = 0; a < hits; a++) if (buffer[4 * a + 3] & 0xFFFF0000) has_bones = 1;
01517 
01518             /* note; shift+alt goes to group-flush-selecting */
01519             if (has_bones == 0 && enumerate) {
01520                 basact = object_mouse_select_menu(C, &vc, buffer, hits, mval, extend);
01521             }
01522             else {
01523                 basact = mouse_select_eval_buffer(&vc, buffer, hits, mval, startbase, has_bones);
01524             }
01525             
01526             if (has_bones && basact) {
01527                 if (basact->object->type == OB_CAMERA) {
01528                     if (BASACT == basact) {
01529                         int i, hitresult;
01530                         int changed = 0;
01531 
01532                         for (i = 0; i < hits; i++) {
01533                             hitresult = buffer[3 + (i * 4)];
01534 
01535                             /* if there's bundles in buffer select bundles first,
01536                              * so non-camera elements should be ignored in buffer */
01537                             if (basact->selcol != (hitresult & 0xFFFF)) {
01538                                 continue;
01539                             }
01540 
01541                             /* index of bundle is 1<<16-based. if there's no "bone" index
01542                              * in hight word, this buffer value belongs to camera,. not to bundle */
01543                             if (buffer[4 * i + 3] & 0xFFFF0000) {
01544                                 MovieClip *clip = object_get_movieclip(scene, basact->object, 0);
01545                                 MovieTracking *tracking = &clip->tracking;
01546                                 ListBase *tracksbase;
01547                                 MovieTrackingTrack *track;
01548 
01549                                 track = BKE_tracking_indexed_track(&clip->tracking, hitresult >> 16, &tracksbase);
01550 
01551                                 if (TRACK_SELECTED(track) && extend) {
01552                                     changed = 0;
01553                                     BKE_tracking_deselect_track(track, TRACK_AREA_ALL);
01554                                 }
01555                                 else {
01556                                     int oldsel = TRACK_SELECTED(track) ? 1 : 0;
01557                                     if (!extend)
01558                                         deselect_all_tracks(tracking);
01559 
01560                                     BKE_tracking_select_track(tracksbase, track, TRACK_AREA_ALL, extend);
01561 
01562                                     if (oldsel != (TRACK_SELECTED(track) ? 1 : 0))
01563                                         changed = 1;
01564                                 }
01565 
01566                                 basact->flag |= SELECT;
01567                                 basact->object->flag = basact->flag;
01568 
01569                                 retval = 1;
01570 
01571                                 WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_MOVIECLIP | ND_SELECT, track);
01572                                 WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE | ND_OB_SELECT, scene);
01573 
01574                                 break;
01575                             }
01576                         }
01577 
01578                         if (!changed) {
01579                             /* fallback to regular object selection if no new bundles were selected,
01580                              * allows to select object parented to reconstruction object */
01581                             basact = mouse_select_eval_buffer(&vc, buffer, hits, mval, startbase, 0);
01582                         }
01583                     }
01584                 }
01585                 else if (ED_do_pose_selectbuffer(scene, basact, buffer, hits, extend) ) {   /* then bone is found */
01586                 
01587                     /* we make the armature selected: 
01588                      * not-selected active object in posemode won't work well for tools */
01589                     basact->flag |= SELECT;
01590                     basact->object->flag = basact->flag;
01591                     
01592                     retval = 1;
01593                     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT | ND_BONE_SELECT, basact->object);
01594                     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT | ND_BONE_ACTIVE, basact->object);
01595                     
01596                     /* in weightpaint, we use selected bone to select vertexgroup, so no switch to new active object */
01597                     if (BASACT && (BASACT->object->mode & OB_MODE_WEIGHT_PAINT)) {
01598                         /* prevent activating */
01599                         basact = NULL;
01600                     }
01601 
01602                 }
01603                 /* prevent bone selecting to pass on to object selecting */
01604                 if (basact == BASACT)
01605                     basact = NULL;
01606             }
01607         }
01608     }
01609     
01610     /* so, do we have something selected? */
01611     if (basact) {
01612         retval = 1;
01613         
01614         if (vc.obedit) {
01615             /* only do select */
01616             deselectall_except(scene, basact);
01617             ED_base_object_select(basact, BA_SELECT);
01618         }
01619         /* also prevent making it active on mouse selection */
01620         else if (BASE_SELECTABLE(v3d, basact)) {
01621 
01622             oldbasact = BASACT;
01623             
01624             if (!extend) {
01625                 deselectall_except(scene, basact);
01626                 ED_base_object_select(basact, BA_SELECT);
01627             }
01628             else if (0) {
01629                 // XXX select_all_from_groups(basact);
01630             }
01631             else {
01632                 if (basact->flag & SELECT) {
01633                     if (basact == oldbasact)
01634                         ED_base_object_select(basact, BA_DESELECT);
01635                 }
01636                 else ED_base_object_select(basact, BA_SELECT);
01637             }
01638 
01639             if (oldbasact != basact) {
01640                 ED_base_object_activate(C, basact); /* adds notifier */
01641             }
01642         }
01643 
01644         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE | ND_OB_SELECT, scene);
01645     }
01646 
01647     return retval;
01648 }
01649 
01650 /* ********************  border and circle ************************************** */
01651 
01652 typedef struct BoxSelectUserData {
01653     ViewContext *vc;
01654     rcti *rect;
01655     int select, pass, done;
01656 } BoxSelectUserData;
01657 
01658 int edge_inside_circle(short centx, short centy, short rad, short x1, short y1, short x2, short y2)
01659 {
01660     int radsq = rad * rad;
01661     float v1[2], v2[2], v3[2];
01662     
01663     /* check points in circle itself */
01664     if ( (x1 - centx) * (x1 - centx) + (y1 - centy) * (y1 - centy) <= radsq) return 1;
01665     if ( (x2 - centx) * (x2 - centx) + (y2 - centy) * (y2 - centy) <= radsq) return 1;
01666     
01667     /* pointdistline */
01668     v3[0] = centx;
01669     v3[1] = centy;
01670     v1[0] = x1;
01671     v1[1] = y1;
01672     v2[0] = x2;
01673     v2[1] = y2;
01674     
01675     if (dist_to_line_segment_v2(v3, v1, v2) < (float)rad) return 1;
01676     
01677     return 0;
01678 }
01679 
01680 static void do_nurbs_box_select__doSelect(void *userData, Nurb *UNUSED(nu), BPoint *bp, BezTriple *bezt, int beztindex, int x, int y)
01681 {
01682     BoxSelectUserData *data = userData;
01683     Object *obedit = data->vc->obedit;
01684     Curve *cu = (Curve *)obedit->data;
01685 
01686     if (BLI_in_rcti(data->rect, x, y)) {
01687         if (bp) {
01688             bp->f1 = data->select ? (bp->f1 | SELECT) : (bp->f1 & ~SELECT);
01689             if (bp == cu->lastsel && !(bp->f1 & 1)) cu->lastsel = NULL;
01690         }
01691         else {
01692             if (cu->drawflag & CU_HIDE_HANDLES) {
01693                 /* can only be beztindex==0 here since handles are hidden */
01694                 bezt->f1 = bezt->f2 = bezt->f3 = data->select ? (bezt->f2 | SELECT) : (bezt->f2 & ~SELECT);
01695             }
01696             else {
01697                 if (beztindex == 0) {
01698                     bezt->f1 = data->select ? (bezt->f1 | SELECT) : (bezt->f1 & ~SELECT);
01699                 }
01700                 else if (beztindex == 1) {
01701                     bezt->f2 = data->select ? (bezt->f2 | SELECT) : (bezt->f2 & ~SELECT);
01702                 }
01703                 else {
01704                     bezt->f3 = data->select ? (bezt->f3 | SELECT) : (bezt->f3 & ~SELECT);
01705                 }
01706             }
01707 
01708             if (bezt == cu->lastsel && !(bezt->f2 & 1)) cu->lastsel = NULL;
01709         }
01710     }
01711 }
01712 static int do_nurbs_box_select(ViewContext *vc, rcti *rect, int select, int extend)
01713 {
01714     BoxSelectUserData data;
01715     
01716     data.vc = vc;
01717     data.rect = rect;
01718     data.select = select;
01719 
01720     if (extend == 0 && select)
01721         CU_deselect_all(vc->obedit);
01722 
01723     ED_view3d_init_mats_rv3d(vc->obedit, vc->rv3d); /* for foreach's screen/vert projection */
01724     nurbs_foreachScreenVert(vc, do_nurbs_box_select__doSelect, &data);
01725 
01726     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01727 }
01728 
01729 static void do_lattice_box_select__doSelect(void *userData, BPoint *bp, int x, int y)
01730 {
01731     BoxSelectUserData *data = userData;
01732 
01733     if (BLI_in_rcti(data->rect, x, y)) {
01734         bp->f1 = data->select ? (bp->f1 | SELECT) : (bp->f1 & ~SELECT);
01735     }
01736 }
01737 static int do_lattice_box_select(ViewContext *vc, rcti *rect, int select, int extend)
01738 {
01739     BoxSelectUserData data;
01740 
01741     data.vc = vc;
01742     data.rect = rect;
01743     data.select = select;
01744 
01745     if (extend == 0 && select)
01746         ED_setflagsLatt(vc->obedit, 0);
01747 
01748     ED_view3d_init_mats_rv3d(vc->obedit, vc->rv3d); /* for foreach's screen/vert projection */
01749     lattice_foreachScreenVert(vc, do_lattice_box_select__doSelect, &data);
01750     
01751     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01752 }
01753 
01754 static void do_mesh_box_select__doSelectVert(void *userData, BMVert *eve, int x, int y, int UNUSED(index))
01755 {
01756     BoxSelectUserData *data = userData;
01757 
01758     if (BLI_in_rcti(data->rect, x, y)) {
01759         BM_vert_select_set(data->vc->em->bm, eve, data->select);
01760     }
01761 }
01762 static void do_mesh_box_select__doSelectEdge(void *userData, BMEdge *eed, int x0, int y0, int x1, int y1, int index)
01763 {
01764     BoxSelectUserData *data = userData;
01765 
01766     if (EDBM_backbuf_check(bm_solidoffs + index)) {
01767         if (data->pass == 0) {
01768             if (edge_fully_inside_rect(data->rect, x0, y0, x1, y1)) {
01769                 BM_edge_select_set(data->vc->em->bm, eed, data->select);
01770                 data->done = 1;
01771             }
01772         }
01773         else {
01774             if (edge_inside_rect(data->rect, x0, y0, x1, y1)) {
01775                 BM_edge_select_set(data->vc->em->bm, eed, data->select);
01776             }
01777         }
01778     }
01779 }
01780 static void do_mesh_box_select__doSelectFace(void *userData, BMFace *efa, int x, int y, int UNUSED(index))
01781 {
01782     BoxSelectUserData *data = userData;
01783 
01784     if (BLI_in_rcti(data->rect, x, y)) {
01785         BM_face_select_set(data->vc->em->bm, efa, data->select);
01786     }
01787 }
01788 static int do_mesh_box_select(ViewContext *vc, rcti *rect, int select, int extend)
01789 {
01790     BoxSelectUserData data;
01791     ToolSettings *ts = vc->scene->toolsettings;
01792     int bbsel;
01793     
01794     data.vc = vc;
01795     data.rect = rect;
01796     data.select = select;
01797     data.pass = 0;
01798     data.done = 0;
01799 
01800     if (extend == 0 && select)
01801         EDBM_flag_disable_all(vc->em, BM_ELEM_SELECT);
01802 
01803     /* for non zbuf projections, don't change the GL state */
01804     ED_view3d_init_mats_rv3d(vc->obedit, vc->rv3d);
01805 
01806     glLoadMatrixf(vc->rv3d->viewmat);
01807     bbsel = EDBM_backbuf_border_init(vc, rect->xmin, rect->ymin, rect->xmax, rect->ymax);
01808 
01809     if (ts->selectmode & SCE_SELECT_VERTEX) {
01810         if (bbsel) {
01811             edbm_backbuf_check_and_select_verts(vc->em, select);
01812         }
01813         else {
01814             mesh_foreachScreenVert(vc, do_mesh_box_select__doSelectVert, &data, V3D_CLIP_TEST_RV3D_CLIPPING);
01815         }
01816     }
01817     if (ts->selectmode & SCE_SELECT_EDGE) {
01818         /* Does both bbsel and non-bbsel versions (need screen cos for both) */
01819 
01820         data.pass = 0;
01821         mesh_foreachScreenEdge(vc, do_mesh_box_select__doSelectEdge, &data, V3D_CLIP_TEST_OFF);
01822 
01823         if (data.done == 0) {
01824             data.pass = 1;
01825             mesh_foreachScreenEdge(vc, do_mesh_box_select__doSelectEdge, &data, V3D_CLIP_TEST_OFF);
01826         }
01827     }
01828     
01829     if (ts->selectmode & SCE_SELECT_FACE) {
01830         if (bbsel) {
01831             edbm_backbuf_check_and_select_faces(vc->em, select);
01832         }
01833         else {
01834             mesh_foreachScreenFace(vc, do_mesh_box_select__doSelectFace, &data);
01835         }
01836     }
01837     
01838     EDBM_backbuf_free();
01839         
01840     EDBM_selectmode_flush(vc->em);
01841     
01842     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01843 }
01844 
01845 static int do_meta_box_select(ViewContext *vc, rcti *rect, int select, int extend)
01846 {
01847     MetaBall *mb = (MetaBall *)vc->obedit->data;
01848     MetaElem *ml;
01849     int a;
01850 
01851     unsigned int buffer[4 * MAXPICKBUF];
01852     short hits;
01853 
01854     hits = view3d_opengl_select(vc, buffer, MAXPICKBUF, rect);
01855 
01856     if (extend == 0 && select) {
01857         for (ml = mb->editelems->first; ml; ml = ml->next) {
01858             ml->flag &= ~SELECT;
01859         }
01860     }
01861     
01862     for (ml = mb->editelems->first; ml; ml = ml->next) {
01863         for (a = 0; a < hits; a++) {
01864             if (ml->selcol1 == buffer[(4 * a) + 3]) {
01865                 ml->flag |= MB_SCALE_RAD;
01866                 if (select) ml->flag |= SELECT;
01867                 else ml->flag &= ~SELECT;
01868                 break;
01869             }
01870             if (ml->selcol2 == buffer[(4 * a) + 3]) {
01871                 ml->flag &= ~MB_SCALE_RAD;
01872                 if (select) ml->flag |= SELECT;
01873                 else ml->flag &= ~SELECT;
01874                 break;
01875             }
01876         }
01877     }
01878 
01879     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01880 }
01881 
01882 static int do_armature_box_select(ViewContext *vc, rcti *rect, short select, short extend)
01883 {
01884     bArmature *arm = vc->obedit->data;
01885     EditBone *ebone;
01886     int a;
01887 
01888     unsigned int buffer[4 * MAXPICKBUF];
01889     short hits;
01890 
01891     hits = view3d_opengl_select(vc, buffer, MAXPICKBUF, rect);
01892     
01893     /* clear flag we use to detect point was affected */
01894     for (ebone = arm->edbo->first; ebone; ebone = ebone->next)
01895         ebone->flag &= ~BONE_DONE;
01896     
01897     if (extend == 0 && select)
01898         ED_armature_deselect_all_visible(vc->obedit);
01899 
01900     /* first we only check points inside the border */
01901     for (a = 0; a < hits; a++) {
01902         int index = buffer[(4 * a) + 3];
01903         if (index != -1) {
01904             ebone = BLI_findlink(arm->edbo, index & ~(BONESEL_ANY));
01905             if ((ebone->flag & BONE_UNSELECTABLE) == 0) {
01906                 if (index & BONESEL_TIP) {
01907                     ebone->flag |= BONE_DONE;
01908                     if (select) ebone->flag |= BONE_TIPSEL;
01909                     else ebone->flag &= ~BONE_TIPSEL;
01910                 }
01911                 
01912                 if (index & BONESEL_ROOT) {
01913                     ebone->flag |= BONE_DONE;
01914                     if (select) ebone->flag |= BONE_ROOTSEL;
01915                     else ebone->flag &= ~BONE_ROOTSEL;
01916                 }
01917             }
01918         }
01919     }
01920     
01921     /* now we have to flush tag from parents... */
01922     for (ebone = arm->edbo->first; ebone; ebone = ebone->next) {
01923         if (ebone->parent && (ebone->flag & BONE_CONNECTED)) {
01924             if (ebone->parent->flag & BONE_DONE)
01925                 ebone->flag |= BONE_DONE;
01926         }
01927     }
01928     
01929     /* only select/deselect entire bones when no points where in the rect */
01930     for (a = 0; a < hits; a++) {
01931         int index = buffer[(4 * a) + 3];
01932         if (index != -1) {
01933             ebone = BLI_findlink(arm->edbo, index & ~(BONESEL_ANY));
01934             if (index & BONESEL_BONE) {
01935                 if ((ebone->flag & BONE_UNSELECTABLE) == 0) {
01936                     if (!(ebone->flag & BONE_DONE)) {
01937                         if (select)
01938                             ebone->flag |= (BONE_ROOTSEL | BONE_TIPSEL | BONE_SELECTED);
01939                         else
01940                             ebone->flag &= ~(BONE_ROOTSEL | BONE_TIPSEL | BONE_SELECTED);
01941                     }
01942                 }
01943             }
01944         }
01945     }
01946     
01947     ED_armature_sync_selection(arm->edbo);
01948     
01949     return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01950 }
01951 
01952 static int do_object_pose_box_select(bContext *C, ViewContext *vc, rcti *rect, int select, int extend)
01953 {
01954     Bone *bone;
01955     Object *ob = vc->obact;
01956     unsigned int *vbuffer = NULL; /* selection buffer   */
01957     unsigned int *col;          /* color in buffer  */
01958     int bone_only;
01959     int bone_selected = 0;
01960     int totobj = MAXPICKBUF; // XXX solve later
01961     short hits;
01962     
01963     if ((ob) && (ob->mode & OB_MODE_POSE))
01964         bone_only = 1;
01965     else
01966         bone_only = 0;
01967     
01968     if (extend == 0 && select) {
01969         if (bone_only) {
01970             CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, bPoseChannel *, pchan, visible_pose_bones) {
01971                 if ((pchan->bone->flag & BONE_UNSELECTABLE) == 0) {
01972                     pchan->bone->flag &= ~(BONE_SELECTED | BONE_TIPSEL | BONE_ROOTSEL);
01973                 }
01974             }
01975             CTX_DATA_END;
01976         }
01977         else {
01978             object_deselect_all_visible(vc->scene, vc->v3d);
01979         }
01980     }
01981 
01982     /* selection buffer now has bones potentially too, so we add MAXPICKBUF */
01983     vbuffer = MEM_mallocN(4 * (totobj + MAXPICKBUF) * sizeof(unsigned int), "selection buffer");
01984     hits = view3d_opengl_select(vc, vbuffer, 4 * (totobj + MAXPICKBUF), rect);
01985     /*
01986      * LOGIC NOTES (theeth):
01987      * The buffer and ListBase have the same relative order, which makes the selection
01988      * very simple. Loop through both data sets at the same time, if the color
01989      * is the same as the object, we have a hit and can move to the next color
01990      * and object pair, if not, just move to the next object,
01991      * keeping the same color until we have a hit.
01992      * 
01993      * The buffer order is defined by OGL standard, hopefully no stupid GFX card
01994      * does it incorrectly.
01995      */
01996 
01997     if (hits > 0) { /* no need to loop if there's no hit */
01998         Base *base;
01999         col = vbuffer + 3;
02000         
02001         for (base = vc->scene->base.first; base && hits; base = base->next) {
02002             if (BASE_SELECTABLE(vc->v3d, base)) {
02003                 while (base->selcol == (*col & 0xFFFF)) {   /* we got an object */
02004                     
02005                     if (*col & 0xFFFF0000) {                    /* we got a bone */
02006                         bone = get_indexed_bone(base->object, *col & ~(BONESEL_ANY));
02007                         if (bone) {
02008                             if (select) {
02009                                 if ((bone->flag & BONE_UNSELECTABLE) == 0) {
02010                                     bone->flag |= BONE_SELECTED;
02011                                     bone_selected = 1;
02012 // XXX                                  select_actionchannel_by_name(base->object->action, bone->name, 1);
02013                                 }
02014                             }
02015                             else {
02016                                 bArmature *arm = base->object->data;
02017                                 bone->flag &= ~BONE_SELECTED;
02018 // XXX                                  select_actionchannel_by_name(base->object->action, bone->name, 0);
02019                                 if (arm->act_bone == bone)
02020                                     arm->act_bone = NULL;
02021                                 
02022                             }
02023                         }
02024                     }
02025                     else if (!bone_only) {
02026                         if (select)
02027                             ED_base_object_select(base, BA_SELECT);
02028                         else
02029                             ED_base_object_select(base, BA_DESELECT);
02030                     }
02031 
02032                     col += 4; /* next color */
02033                     hits--;
02034                     if (hits == 0) break;
02035                 }
02036             }
02037             
02038             if (bone_selected) {
02039                 WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT | ND_BONE_SELECT, base->object);
02040             }
02041         }
02042 
02043         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE | ND_OB_SELECT, vc->scene);
02044 
02045     }
02046     MEM_freeN(vbuffer);
02047 
02048     return hits > 0 ? OPERATOR_FINISHED : OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
02049 }
02050 
02051 static int view3d_borderselect_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
02052 {
02053     ViewContext vc;
02054     rcti rect;
02055     short extend;
02056     short select;
02057 
02058     int ret = OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
02059 
02060     view3d_operator_needs_opengl(C);
02061 
02062     /* setup view context for argument to callbacks */
02063     view3d_set_viewcontext(C, &vc);
02064     
02065     select = (RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "gesture_mode") == GESTURE_MODAL_SELECT);
02066     rect.xmin = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "xmin");
02067     rect.ymin = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "ymin");
02068     rect.xmax = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "xmax");
02069     rect.ymax = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "ymax");
02070     extend = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "extend");
02071 
02072     if (vc.obedit) {
02073         switch (vc.obedit->type) {
02074             case OB_MESH:
02075                 vc.em = BMEdit_FromObject(vc.obedit);
02076                 ret = do_mesh_box_select(&vc, &rect, select, extend);
02077 //          if (EM_texFaceCheck())
02078                 if (ret & OPERATOR_FINISHED) {
02079                     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM | ND_SELECT, vc.obedit->data);
02080                 }
02081                 break;
02082             case OB_CURVE:
02083             case OB_SURF:
02084                 ret = do_nurbs_box_select(&vc, &rect, select, extend);
02085                 if (ret & OPERATOR_FINISHED) {
02086                     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM | ND_SELECT, vc.obedit->data);
02087                 }
02088                 break;
02089             case OB_MBALL:
02090                 ret = do_meta_box_select(&vc, &rect, select, extend);
02091                 if (ret & OPERATOR_FINISHED) {
02092                     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM | ND_SELECT, vc.obedit->data);
02093                 }
02094                 break;
02095             case OB_ARMATURE:
02096                 ret = do_armature_box_select(&vc, &rect, select, extend);
02097                 if (ret & OPERATOR_FINISHED) {
02098                     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT | ND_BONE_SELECT, vc.obedit);
02099                 }
02100                 break;
02101             case OB_LATTICE:
02102                 ret = do_lattice_box_select(&vc, &rect, select, extend);
02103                 if (ret & OPERATOR_FINISHED) {
02104                     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM | ND_SELECT, vc.obedit->data);
02105                 }
02106                 break;
02107             default:
02108                 assert(!"border select on incorrect object type");
02109         }
02110     }
02111     else {  /* no editmode, unified for bones and objects */
02112         if (vc.obact && vc.obact->mode & OB_MODE_SCULPT) {
02113             /* pass */
02114         }
02115         else if (vc.obact && paint_facesel_test(vc.obact)) {
02116             ret = do_paintface_box_select(&vc, &rect, select, extend);
02117         }
02118         else if (vc.obact && paint_vertsel_test(vc.obact)) {
02119             ret = do_paintvert_box_select(&vc, &rect, select, extend);
02120         }
02121         else if (vc.obact && vc.obact->mode & OB_MODE_PARTICLE_EDIT) {
02122             ret = PE_border_select(C, &rect, select, extend);
02123         }
02124         else { /* object mode with none active */
02125             ret = do_object_pose_box_select(C, &vc, &rect, select, extend);
02126         }
02127     }
02128 
02129     return ret;
02130 } 
02131 
02132 
02133 /* *****************Selection Operators******************* */
02134 
02135 /* ****** Border Select ****** */
02136 void VIEW3D_OT_select_border(wmOperatorType *ot)
02137 {
02138     /* identifiers */
02139     ot->name = "Border Select";
02140     ot->description = "Select items using border selection";
02141     ot->idname = "VIEW3D_OT_select_border";
02142     
02143     /* api callbacks */
02144     ot->invoke = WM_border_select_invoke;
02145     ot->exec = view3d_borderselect_exec;
02146     ot->modal = WM_border_select_modal;
02147     ot->poll = view3d_selectable_data;
02148     ot->cancel = WM_border_select_cancel;
02149     
02150     /* flags */
02151     ot->flag = OPTYPE_UNDO;
02152     
02153     /* rna */
02154     WM_operator_properties_gesture_border(ot, TRUE);
02155 }
02156 
02157 /* much like facesel_face_pick()*/
02158 /* returns 0 if not found, otherwise 1 */
02159 static int vertsel_vert_pick(struct bContext *C, Mesh *me, const int mval[2], unsigned int *index, int size)
02160 {
02161     ViewContext vc;
02162     view3d_set_viewcontext(C, &vc);
02163 
02164     if (!me || me->totvert == 0)
02165         return 0;
02166 
02167     if (size > 0) {
02168         /* sample rect to increase changes of selecting, so that when clicking
02169          * on an face in the backbuf, we can still select a vert */
02170 
02171         int dist;
02172         *index = view3d_sample_backbuf_rect(&vc, mval, size, 1, me->totvert + 1, &dist, 0, NULL, NULL);
02173     }
02174     else {
02175         /* sample only on the exact position */
02176         *index = view3d_sample_backbuf(&vc, mval[0], mval[1]);
02177     }
02178 
02179     if ((*index) <= 0 || (*index) > (unsigned int)me->totvert)
02180         return 0;
02181 
02182     (*index)--;
02183     
02184     return 1;
02185 }
02186 
02187 /* mouse selection in weight paint */
02188 /* gets called via generic mouse select operator */
02189 static int mouse_weight_paint_vertex_select(bContext *C, const int mval[2], short extend, Object *obact)
02190 {
02191     Mesh*me = obact->data; /* already checked for NULL */
02192     unsigned int index = 0;
02193     MVert *mv;
02194 
02195     if (vertsel_vert_pick(C, me, mval, &index, 50)) {
02196         mv = me->mvert + index;
02197         if (extend) {
02198             mv->flag ^= SELECT;
02199         }
02200         else {
02201             paintvert_deselect_all_visible(obact, SEL_DESELECT, FALSE);
02202             mv->flag |= SELECT;
02203         }
02204         paintvert_flush_flags(obact);
02205         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM | ND_SELECT, obact->data);
02206         return 1;
02207     }
02208     return 0;
02209 }
02210 
02211 /* ****** Mouse Select ****** */
02212 
02213 
02214 static int view3d_select_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
02215 {
02216     Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
02217     Object *obact = CTX_data_active_object(C);
02218     short extend = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "extend");
02219     short center = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "center");
02220     short enumerate = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "enumerate");
02221     short object = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "object");
02222     int retval = 0;
02223 
02224     view3d_operator_needs_opengl(C);
02225 
02226     if (object) {
02227         obedit = NULL;
02228         obact = NULL;
02229 
02230         /* ack, this is incorrect but to do this correctly we would need an
02231          * alternative editmode/objectmode keymap, this copies the functionality
02232          * from 2.4x where Ctrl+Select in editmode does object select only */
02233         center = FALSE;
02234     }
02235 
02236     if (obedit && object == FALSE) {
02237         if (obedit->type == OB_MESH)
02238             retval = mouse_mesh(C, event->mval, extend);
02239         else if (obedit->type == OB_ARMATURE)
02240             retval = mouse_armature(C, event->mval, extend);
02241         else if (obedit->type == OB_LATTICE)
02242             retval = mouse_lattice(C, event->mval, extend);
02243         else if (ELEM(obedit->type, OB_CURVE, OB_SURF))
02244             retval = mouse_nurb(C, event->mval, extend);
02245         else if (obedit->type == OB_MBALL)
02246             retval = mouse_mball(C, event->mval, extend);
02247             
02248     }
02249     else if (obact && obact->mode & OB_MODE_SCULPT)
02250         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
02251     else if (obact && obact->mode & OB_MODE_PARTICLE_EDIT)
02252         return PE_mouse_particles(C, event->mval, extend);
02253     else if (obact && paint_facesel_test(obact))
02254         retval = paintface_mouse_select(C, obact, event->mval, extend);
02255     else if (paint_vertsel_test(obact))
02256         retval = mouse_weight_paint_vertex_select(C, event->mval, extend, obact);
02257     else
02258         retval = mouse_select(C, event->mval, extend, center, enumerate);
02259 
02260     /* passthrough allows tweaks
02261      * FINISHED to signal one operator worked
02262      * */
02263     if (retval)
02264         return OPERATOR_PASS_THROUGH | OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02265     else
02266         return OPERATOR_PASS_THROUGH;  /* nothing selected, just passthrough */
02267 }
02268 
02269 void VIEW3D_OT_select(wmOperatorType *ot)
02270 {
02271     /* identifiers */
02272     ot->name = "Activate/Select";
02273     ot->description = "Activate/select item(s)";
02274     ot->idname = "VIEW3D_OT_select";
02275     
02276     /* api callbacks */
02277     ot->invoke = view3d_select_invoke;
02278     ot->poll = ED_operator_view3d_active;
02279     
02280     /* flags */
02281     ot->flag = OPTYPE_UNDO;
02282     
02283     /* properties */
02284     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "extend", 0, "Extend", "Extend selection instead of deselecting everything first");
02285     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "center", 0, "Center", "Use the object center when selecting, in editmode used to extend object selection");
02286     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "enumerate", 0, "Enumerate", "List objects under the mouse (object mode only)");
02287     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "object", 0, "Object", "Use object selection (editmode only)");
02288 }
02289 
02290 
02291 /* -------------------- circle select --------------------------------------------- */
02292 
02293 typedef struct CircleSelectUserData {
02294     ViewContext *vc;
02295     short select;
02296     int mval[2];
02297     float radius;
02298 } CircleSelectUserData;
02299 
02300 static void mesh_circle_doSelectVert(void *userData, BMVert *eve, int x, int y, int UNUSED(index))
02301 {
02302     CircleSelectUserData *data = userData;
02303     int mx = x - data->mval[0], my = y - data->mval[1];
02304     float r = sqrt(mx * mx + my * my);
02305 
02306     if (r <= data->radius) {
02307         BM_vert_select_set(data->vc->em->bm, eve, data->select);
02308     }
02309 }
02310 static void mesh_circle_doSelectEdge(void *userData, BMEdge *eed, int x0, int y0, int x1, int y1, int UNUSED(index))
02311 {
02312     CircleSelectUserData *data = userData;
02313 
02314     if (edge_inside_circle(data->mval[0], data->mval[1], (short) data->radius, x0, y0, x1, y1)) {
02315         BM_edge_select_set(data->vc->em->bm, eed, data->select);
02316     }
02317 }
02318 static void mesh_circle_doSelectFace(void *userData, BMFace *efa, int x, int y, int UNUSED(index))
02319 {
02320     CircleSelectUserData *data = userData;
02321     int mx = x - data->mval[0], my = y - data->mval[1];
02322     float r = sqrt(mx * mx + my * my);
02323     
02324     if (r <= data->radius) {
02325         BM_face_select_set(data->vc->em->bm, efa, data->select);
02326     }
02327 }
02328 
02329 static void mesh_circle_select(ViewContext *vc, int select, const int mval[2], float rad)
02330 {
02331     ToolSettings *ts = vc->scene->toolsettings;
02332     int bbsel;
02333     CircleSelectUserData data;
02334     
02335     bbsel = EDBM_backbuf_circle_init(vc, mval[0], mval[1], (short)(rad + 1.0));
02336     ED_view3d_init_mats_rv3d(vc->obedit, vc->rv3d); /* for foreach's screen/vert projection */
02337 
02338     vc->em = BMEdit_FromObject(vc->obedit);
02339 
02340     data.vc = vc;
02341     data.select = select;
02342     data.mval[0] = mval[0];
02343     data.mval[1] = mval[1];
02344     data.radius = rad;
02345 
02346     if (ts->selectmode & SCE_SELECT_VERTEX) {
02347         if (bbsel) {
02348             edbm_backbuf_check_and_select_verts(vc->em, select == LEFTMOUSE);
02349         }
02350         else {
02351             mesh_foreachScreenVert(vc, mesh_circle_doSelectVert, &data, V3D_CLIP_TEST_RV3D_CLIPPING);
02352         }
02353     }
02354 
02355     if (ts->selectmode & SCE_SELECT_EDGE) {
02356         if (bbsel) {
02357             edbm_backbuf_check_and_select_edges(vc->em, select == LEFTMOUSE);
02358         }
02359         else {
02360             mesh_foreachScreenEdge(vc, mesh_circle_doSelectEdge, &data, V3D_CLIP_TEST_OFF);
02361         }
02362     }
02363     
02364     if (ts->selectmode & SCE_SELECT_FACE) {
02365         if (bbsel) {
02366             edbm_backbuf_check_and_select_faces(vc->em, select == LEFTMOUSE);
02367         }
02368         else {
02369             mesh_foreachScreenFace(vc, mesh_circle_doSelectFace, &data);
02370         }
02371     }
02372 
02373     EDBM_backbuf_free();
02374     EDBM_selectmode_flush(vc->em);
02375 }
02376 
02377 static void paint_facesel_circle_select(ViewContext *vc, int select, const int mval[2], float rad)
02378 {
02379     Object *ob = vc->obact;
02380     Mesh *me = ob ? ob->data : NULL;
02381     /* int bbsel; */ /* UNUSED */
02382 
02383     if (me) {
02384         bm_vertoffs = me->totpoly + 1; /* max index array */
02385 
02386         /* bbsel= */ /* UNUSED */ EDBM_backbuf_circle_init(vc, mval[0], mval[1], (short)(rad + 1.0));
02387         edbm_backbuf_check_and_select_tfaces(me, select == LEFTMOUSE);
02388         EDBM_backbuf_free();
02389     }
02390 }
02391 
02392 
02393 static void paint_vertsel_circle_select(ViewContext *vc, int select, const int mval[2], float rad)
02394 {
02395     Object *ob = vc->obact;
02396     Mesh *me = ob ? ob->data : NULL;
02397     /* int bbsel; */ /* UNUSED */
02398     /* CircleSelectUserData data = {NULL}; */ /* UNUSED */
02399     if (me) {
02400         bm_vertoffs = me->totvert + 1; /* max index array */
02401 
02402         /* bbsel= */ /* UNUSED */ EDBM_backbuf_circle_init(vc, mval[0], mval[1], (short)(rad + 1.0f));
02403         edbm_backbuf_check_and_select_verts_obmode(me, select == LEFTMOUSE);
02404         EDBM_backbuf_free();
02405 
02406         paintvert_flush_flags(ob);
02407     }
02408 }

02410 
02411 static void nurbscurve_circle_doSelect(void *userData, Nurb *UNUSED(nu), BPoint *bp, BezTriple *bezt, int beztindex, int x, int y)
02412 {
02413     CircleSelectUserData *data = userData;
02414     int mx = x - data->mval[0], my = y - data->mval[1];
02415     float r = sqrt(mx * mx + my * my);
02416     Object *obedit = data->vc->obedit;
02417     Curve *cu = (Curve *)obedit->data;
02418 
02419     if (r <= data->radius) {
02420         if (bp) {
02421             bp->f1 = data->select ? (bp->f1 | SELECT) : (bp->f1 & ~SELECT);
02422 
02423             if (bp == cu->lastsel && !(bp->f1 & 1)) cu->lastsel = NULL;
02424         }
02425         else {
02426             if (cu->drawflag & CU_HIDE_HANDLES) {
02427                 /* can only be beztindex==0 here since handles are hidden */
02428                 bezt->f1 = bezt->f2 = bezt->f3 = data->select ? (bezt->f2 | SELECT) : (bezt->f2 & ~SELECT);
02429             }
02430             else {
02431                 if (beztindex == 0) {
02432                     bezt->f1 = data->select ? (bezt->f1 | SELECT) : (bezt->f1 & ~SELECT);
02433                 }
02434                 else if (beztindex == 1) {
02435                     bezt->f2 = data->select ? (bezt->f2 | SELECT) : (bezt->f2 & ~SELECT);
02436                 }
02437                 else {
02438                     bezt->f3 = data->select ? (bezt->f3 | SELECT) : (bezt->f3 & ~SELECT);
02439                 }
02440             }
02441 
02442             if (bezt == cu->lastsel && !(bezt->f2 & 1)) cu->lastsel = NULL;
02443         }
02444     }
02445 }
02446 static void nurbscurve_circle_select(ViewContext *vc, int select, const int mval[2], float rad)
02447 {
02448     CircleSelectUserData data;
02449 
02450     /* set vc-> edit data */
02451     
02452     data.select = select;
02453     data.mval[0] = mval[0];
02454     data.mval[1] = mval[1];
02455     data.radius = rad;
02456     data.vc = vc;
02457 
02458     ED_view3d_init_mats_rv3d(vc->obedit, vc->rv3d); /* for foreach's screen/vert projection */
02459     nurbs_foreachScreenVert(vc, nurbscurve_circle_doSelect, &data);
02460 }

02463 static void latticecurve_circle_doSelect(void *userData, BPoint *bp, int x, int y)
02464 {
02465     CircleSelectUserData *data = userData;
02466     int mx = x - data->mval[0], my = y - data->mval[1];
02467     float r = sqrt(mx * mx + my * my);
02468 
02469     if (r <= data->radius) {
02470         bp->f1 = data->select ? (bp->f1 | SELECT) : (bp->f1 & ~SELECT);
02471     }
02472 }
02473 static void lattice_circle_select(ViewContext *vc, int select, const int mval[2], float rad)
02474 {
02475     CircleSelectUserData data;
02476 
02477     /* set vc-> edit data */
02478     
02479     data.select = select;
02480     data.mval[0] = mval[0];
02481     data.mval[1] = mval[1];
02482     data.radius = rad;
02483 
02484     ED_view3d_init_mats_rv3d(vc->obedit, vc->rv3d); /* for foreach's screen/vert projection */
02485     lattice_foreachScreenVert(vc, latticecurve_circle_doSelect, &data);

02487 
02488 
02489 // NOTE: pose-bone case is copied from editbone case...
02490 static short pchan_circle_doSelectJoint(void *userData, bPoseChannel *pchan, int x, int y)
02491 {
02492     CircleSelectUserData *data = userData;
02493     int mx = x - data->mval[0], my = y - data->mval[1];
02494     float r = sqrt(mx * mx + my * my);
02495     
02496     if (r <= data->radius) {
02497         if (data->select)
02498             pchan->bone->flag |= BONE_SELECTED;
02499         else
02500             pchan->bone->flag &= ~BONE_SELECTED;
02501         return 1;
02502     }
02503     return 0;
02504 }
02505 static void pose_circle_select(ViewContext *vc, int select, const int mval[2], float rad)
02506 {
02507     CircleSelectUserData data;
02508     bArmature *arm = vc->obact->data;
02509     bPose *pose = vc->obact->pose;
02510     bPoseChannel *pchan;
02511     int change = FALSE;
02512     
02513     /* set vc->edit data */
02514     data.select = select;
02515     data.mval[0] = mval[0];
02516     data.mval[1] = mval[1];
02517     data.radius = rad;
02518 
02519     ED_view3d_init_mats_rv3d(vc->obact, vc->rv3d); /* for foreach's screen/vert projection */
02520     
02521     /* check each PoseChannel... */
02522     // TODO: could be optimized at some point
02523     for (pchan = pose->chanbase.first; pchan; pchan = pchan->next) {
02524         short sco1[2], sco2[2], didpoint = 0;
02525         float vec[3];
02526         
02527         /* skip invisible bones */
02528         if (PBONE_VISIBLE(arm, pchan->bone) == 0)
02529             continue;
02530         
02531         /* project head location to screenspace */
02532         mul_v3_m4v3(vec, vc->obact->obmat, pchan->pose_head);
02533         project_short(vc->ar, vec, sco1);
02534         
02535         /* project tail location to screenspace */
02536         mul_v3_m4v3(vec, vc->obact->obmat, pchan->pose_tail);
02537         project_short(vc->ar, vec, sco2);
02538         
02539         /* check if the head and/or tail is in the circle 
02540          *  - the call to check also does the selection already
02541          */
02542         if (pchan_circle_doSelectJoint(&data, pchan, sco1[0], sco1[1]))
02543             didpoint = 1;
02544         if (pchan_circle_doSelectJoint(&data, pchan, sco2[0], sco2[1]))
02545             didpoint = 1;
02546         
02547         change |= didpoint;
02548     }
02549 
02550     if (change) {
02551         WM_main_add_notifier(NC_OBJECT | ND_BONE_SELECT, vc->obact);
02552     }
02553 }
02554 
02555 static short armature_circle_doSelectJoint(void *userData, EditBone *ebone, int x, int y, short head)
02556 {
02557     CircleSelectUserData *data = userData;
02558     int mx = x - data->mval[0], my = y - data->mval[1];
02559     float r = sqrt(mx * mx + my * my);
02560     
02561     if (r <= data->radius) {
02562         if (head) {
02563             if (data->select)
02564                 ebone->flag |= BONE_ROOTSEL;
02565             else 
02566                 ebone->flag &= ~BONE_ROOTSEL;
02567         }
02568         else {
02569             if (data->select)
02570                 ebone->flag |= BONE_TIPSEL;
02571             else 
02572                 ebone->flag &= ~BONE_TIPSEL;
02573         }
02574         return 1;
02575     }
02576     return 0;
02577 }
02578 static void armature_circle_select(ViewContext *vc, int select, const int mval[2], float rad)
02579 {
02580     CircleSelectUserData data;
02581     bArmature *arm = vc->obedit->data;
02582     EditBone *ebone;
02583     int change = FALSE;
02584     
02585     /* set vc->edit data */
02586     data.select = select;
02587     data.mval[0] = mval[0];
02588     data.mval[1] = mval[1];
02589     data.radius = rad;
02590 
02591     ED_view3d_init_mats_rv3d(vc->obedit, vc->rv3d); /* for foreach's screen/vert projection */
02592     
02593     /* check each EditBone... */
02594     // TODO: could be optimized at some point
02595     for (ebone = arm->edbo->first; ebone; ebone = ebone->next) {
02596         short sco1[2], sco2[2], didpoint = 0;
02597         float vec[3];
02598         
02599         /* project head location to screenspace */
02600         mul_v3_m4v3(vec, vc->obedit->obmat, ebone->head);
02601         project_short(vc->ar, vec, sco1);
02602         
02603         /* project tail location to screenspace */
02604         mul_v3_m4v3(vec, vc->obedit->obmat, ebone->tail);
02605         project_short(vc->ar, vec, sco2);
02606         
02607         /* check if the head and/or tail is in the circle 
02608          *  - the call to check also does the selection already
02609          */
02610         if (armature_circle_doSelectJoint(&data, ebone, sco1[0], sco1[1], 1))
02611             didpoint = 1;
02612         if (armature_circle_doSelectJoint(&data, ebone, sco2[0], sco2[1], 0))
02613             didpoint = 1;
02614             
02615         /* only if the endpoints didn't get selected, deal with the middle of the bone too */
02616         // XXX should we just do this always?
02617         if ( (didpoint == 0) && edge_inside_circle(mval[0], mval[1], rad, sco1[0], sco1[1], sco2[0], sco2[1]) ) {
02618             if (select) 
02619                 ebone->flag |= BONE_TIPSEL | BONE_ROOTSEL | BONE_SELECTED;
02620             else 
02621                 ebone->flag &= ~(BONE_SELECTED | BONE_TIPSEL | BONE_ROOTSEL);
02622             change = TRUE;
02623         }
02624         
02625         change |= didpoint;
02626     }
02627 
02628     if (change) {
02629         ED_armature_sync_selection(arm->edbo);
02630         ED_armature_validate_active(arm);
02631         WM_main_add_notifier(NC_OBJECT | ND_BONE_SELECT, vc->obedit);
02632     }
02633 }
02634 
02637 static void obedit_circle_select(ViewContext *vc, short select, const int mval[2], float rad)
02638 {
02639     switch (vc->obedit->type) {
02640         case OB_MESH:
02641             mesh_circle_select(vc, select, mval, rad);
02642             break;
02643         case OB_CURVE:
02644         case OB_SURF:
02645             nurbscurve_circle_select(vc, select, mval, rad);
02646             break;
02647         case OB_LATTICE:
02648             lattice_circle_select(vc, select, mval, rad);
02649             break;
02650         case OB_ARMATURE:
02651             armature_circle_select(vc, select, mval, rad);
02652             break;
02653         default:
02654             return;
02655     }
02656 }
02657 
02658 /* not a real operator, only for circle test */
02659 static int view3d_circle_select_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
02660 {
02661     ScrArea *sa = CTX_wm_area(C);
02662     ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
02663     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
02664     Object *obact = CTX_data_active_object(C);
02665     View3D *v3d = sa->spacedata.first;
02666     int x = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "x");
02667     int y = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "y");
02668     int radius = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "radius");
02669     int gesture_mode = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "gesture_mode");
02670     int select;
02671     
02672     select = (gesture_mode == GESTURE_MODAL_SELECT);
02673 
02674     if (CTX_data_edit_object(C) || paint_facesel_test(obact) || paint_vertsel_test(obact) ||
02675         (obact && (obact->mode & (OB_MODE_PARTICLE_EDIT | OB_MODE_POSE))) )
02676     {
02677         ViewContext vc;
02678         int mval[2];
02679         
02680         view3d_operator_needs_opengl(C);
02681         
02682         view3d_set_viewcontext(C, &vc);
02683         mval[0] = x;
02684         mval[1] = y;
02685 
02686         if (CTX_data_edit_object(C)) {
02687             obedit_circle_select(&vc, select, mval, (float)radius);
02688             WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM | ND_SELECT, obact->data);
02689         }
02690         else if (paint_facesel_test(obact)) {
02691             paint_facesel_circle_select(&vc, select, mval, (float)radius);
02692             WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM | ND_SELECT, obact->data);
02693         }
02694         else if (paint_vertsel_test(obact)) {
02695             paint_vertsel_circle_select(&vc, select, mval, (float)radius);
02696             WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM | ND_SELECT, obact->data);
02697         }
02698         else if (obact->mode & OB_MODE_POSE)
02699             pose_circle_select(&vc, select, mval, (float)radius);
02700         else
02701             return PE_circle_select(C, select, mval, (float)radius);
02702     }
02703     else if (obact && obact->mode & OB_MODE_SCULPT) {
02704         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
02705     }
02706     else {
02707         Base *base;
02708         select = select ? BA_SELECT : BA_DESELECT;
02709         for (base = FIRSTBASE; base; base = base->next) {
02710             if (BASE_SELECTABLE(v3d, base)) {
02711                 project_short(ar, base->object->obmat[3], &base->sx);
02712                 if (base->sx != IS_CLIPPED) {
02713                     int dx = base->sx - x;
02714                     int dy = base->sy - y;
02715                     if (dx * dx + dy * dy < radius * radius)
02716                         ED_base_object_select(base, select);
02717                 }
02718             }
02719         }
02720         
02721         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE | ND_OB_SELECT, CTX_data_scene(C));
02722     }
02723     
02724     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02725 }
02726 
02727 void VIEW3D_OT_select_circle(wmOperatorType *ot)
02728 {
02729     ot->name = "Circle Select";
02730     ot->description = "Select items using circle selection";
02731     ot->idname = "VIEW3D_OT_select_circle";
02732     
02733     ot->invoke = WM_gesture_circle_invoke;
02734     ot->modal = WM_gesture_circle_modal;
02735     ot->exec = view3d_circle_select_exec;
02736     ot->poll = view3d_selectable_data;
02737     ot->cancel = WM_gesture_circle_cancel;
02738     
02739     /* flags */
02740     ot->flag = OPTYPE_UNDO;
02741     
02742     RNA_def_int(ot->srna, "x", 0, INT_MIN, INT_MAX, "X", "", INT_MIN, INT_MAX);
02743     RNA_def_int(ot->srna, "y", 0, INT_MIN, INT_MAX, "Y", "", INT_MIN, INT_MAX);
02744     RNA_def_int(ot->srna, "radius", 0, INT_MIN, INT_MAX, "Radius", "", INT_MIN, INT_MAX);
02745     RNA_def_int(ot->srna, "gesture_mode", 0, INT_MIN, INT_MAX, "Event Type", "", INT_MIN, INT_MAX);
02746 }
